title: Marketing Specialist
description:
**Company Description**

The Brain and Behavior Clinic is committed to providing the highest quality neuropsychological testing, diagnosis, treatment, and neuro-educational services to our patients and the community we serve through knowledge, professionalism, and integrity. We have helped over 10,000 patients recover from brain injury, improve cognitive function and lead healthier, happier lives.

**Role Description**

The Brain and Behavior Clinic is seeking a Marketing Specialist for a contract role with flexibility for some remote work.

The Marketing Specialist will be responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies to promote the clinic's services and increase brand awareness. They will identify target audiences and develop plans to engage them, create content for social media, newsletters, and other marketing channels, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and measure and analyze the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.

**Qualifications**

**Skills and Experience**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field
* Minimum of 4 years of experience in marketing or a similar role
* Strong experience in digital marketing, social media marketing, and content creation
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Proven ability to develop and execute successful marketing campaigns
* Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
* Experience with website analytics tools and SEO practices
* Experience with Adobe Creative Suite, particularly Photoshop and InDesign, is a plus

**Personal Qualities**

* Effective time-management skills and ability to prioritize tasks
* Highly motivated and detail-oriented
* Ability to work independently and in a team environment
* Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively

Job Type: Contract

Pay: $21.00 per hour

Expected hours: 8 – 24 per week

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule

Schedule:

* Choose your own hours

Work Location: Remote

title: SEO Specialist
description:
Role: **SEO Specialist**  
AVINTIV  
Remote Position  
Pay: $45,000-$55,000

At AVINTIV, our mission is quite simple: to build and grow some of the most competitive and impactful businesses in the world, changing commerce as we know it. Our team has the experience, knowledge, and capabilities to create and build entire brands from the ground up that compete with some of the largest companies in the world. This valuable experience comes from our track record of building and growing over 400 successful brands, resulting in the generation of hundreds of millions of dollars in revenue for our esteemed clients.

We are single-handedly improving and evolving every industry that we touch by simply following our passion and pushing the status quo with every brand that we build and grow! At AVINTIV, our culture and team take precedence. While skills matter, we prioritize hiring individuals who align with our values and culture. After all, we’re also looking to have fun as we change the world at the same time.

**Job role overview:**

We are actively seeking a dynamic and ambitious individual to join our team as an SEO Specialist. As an SEO Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in building, managing, and growing SEO campaigns both internally and externally. Specifically, you will be responsible for managing the day-to-day managing a variety of client’s SEO accounts. Your primary focus will be SEO campaign buildouts, technical SEO, on-page SEO, and off-page SEO. With a keen eye for detail and a knack for problem-solving, you will be the driving force behind turning marketing strategies into tangible results. Additionally, this role is client-facing, requiring effective communication of all campaign details to clients with the support of the marketing team(s).

**Who should apply:**

We're actively searching for individuals who aren't just seeking employment, but who envision making a transformative impact. If you're an experienced SEO Specialist determined to challenge the norm, this opportunity is tailored for you. If you're a creative marketer who relishes experimenting with new theories and enjoys the freedom to trust your instincts, then look no further – this role is for you. We're in search of driven SEO professionals whose passion resonates deeply with SEO itself. For those fueled by the excitement of A/B testing SEO strategies and fearlessly confronting Google's core algorithm updates head-on. Whether you're a seasoned problem-solver or a dynamic individual ready to contribute to the growth of various SEO accounts, we welcome you to join our rapidly expanding team. If you perceive challenges as avenues for growth, thrive on client interaction, and possess the drive to achieve tangible results, take action now. This isn't merely a job; it's an opportunity for visionary professionals to reshape the future of how businesses grow and operate worldwide.

**What you’ll do:**

**SEO Audit:** Perform a comprehensive SEO audit for potential new clients, examining their technical website structure, on-page SEO elements, off-page SEO strategies, and all other pertinent SEO components.

**SEO Campaign Buildout:** Develop and implement customized SEO campaigns tailored to client objectives, utilizing keyword research, on-page optimization, and off-page tactics to drive organic traffic and improve search engine rankings.

**Keyword Research:** Conducting keyword research to identify the most relevant and high-performing keywords for a website's target audience.

**On-Page Optimization:** Optimizing website content, including meta tags, headings, and internal links, to align with targeted keywords and improve search engine rankings.

**Technical SEO:** Performing technical audits to identify and fix issues that may impact a website's crawlability, indexing, and overall performance in search results. This may include addressing issues such as site speed, mobile-friendliness, and site architecture.

**Content Optimization:** Working to optimize website content, including blog posts, articles, service pages, and product descriptions, for search engines and users.

**Off-Page Optimization:** Building high-quality backlinks through outreach, directory listings, guest blogging, and other link-building strategies to improve a website's authority and ranking in search results.

**Performance Monitoring:** Tracking and analyzing website performance using tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMRush, and Screaming Frog to identify opportunities for improvement and measure the impact of SEO efforts.

**Reporting:** Generating regular monthly reports on key SEO metrics, including organic traffic, keyword rankings, and conversion rates, to communicate progress and demonstrate the value of SEO initiatives to stakeholders.

**Keeping Up with Industry Trends:** Staying informed about changes in search engine algorithms, industry best practices, and emerging trends in SEO to continuously adapt strategies and tactics for optimal results.

**Collaboration:** Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including content writers, web developers, and marketing professionals, to implement SEO best practices and achieve shared business goals.

**Client Communication:** Communicating with clients to understand their goals and objectives, provide recommendations for improving SEO performance, and deliver regular updates on progress and results.

**What you’ll bring:**

* **Education and Experience:** A bachelor's degree in marketing, digital marketing, communications, or a related field is preferred; otherwise, 3+ years of proven experience as an SEO Specialist or SEO in an agency setting.
* **Software Knowledge:** Experience and knowledge of proper SEO tools such as Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMRush, etc.
* **SEO Knowledge:** Proven experience in conducting SEO audits and developing actionable SEO campaigns for a business’ traffic and revenue.
* **Analytical Skills:** Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify issues, analyze data, and develop effective solutions.
* **Communication Skills:** Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to communicate effectively with both clients and internal teams.
* **Account Management Skills:** Client-facing experience with the ability to understand and meet client expectations.
* **Organizational Skills:** Demonstrates outstanding organizational and multitasking capabilities with meticulous attention to detail in effectively managing SEO across multiple projects.
* **Self-starter:** Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced environment.

**What we offer:**

* **Working Environment:** AVINTIV is 100% remote, where you can work from your kitchen or a sunny beach- whatever makes you happy
* **Work Schedule:** Flexible working schedule
* **Compensation:** At or above market salary with many opportunities for growth.
* **PTO:** Generous time off, including holidays, vacation, sick, and personal time
* **Growth:** Chance to be a part of a fast-growing company
* **Culture:** 5-star Glass Door rated company with a friendly work environment

**Why AVINTIV?**

With countless employment options currently available, you may be wondering, "Why should I choose to work here?" Firstly, our company was founded by an entrepreneur who, like you, sought to tackle a wide range of business challenges. As evidenced by our 5-star Glassdoor reviews, we genuinely care about our team and their future. Despite being a top-ranked U.S. agency, we remain a boutique firm, free from the corporate and political dramas that plague larger corporations. Our focus is on transforming our clients' lives, improving their customers' experiences, and enjoying the journey along the way. Over the last six years, we've seen year-over-year growth ranging from 30% to 200%, and we're continuously creating new opportunities for internal career advancement before seeking external candidates. You can be confident that by joining our team, you'll have endless prospects to progress your career.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $45,000.00 - $55,000.00 per year

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule
* Paid time off

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift
* Monday to Friday

Application Question(s):

* What industries have you specialized in over the years with SEO?
* Which of the following do you have experience with (list all that apply): B2B, B2C, local, national, ecommerce and service based SEO campaigns?
* Describe the steps you take when completing competitor research, and some of the metrics you prioritize.

Experience:

* local SEO campaign building: 1 year (Required)
* on-page SEO: 1 year (Required)
* off-page SEO: 1 year (Required)
* national campaign: 1 year (Required)
* Keyword research: 1 year (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: Email Marketing Specialist
description:
**Email Marketer**  

An Email Marketer is a professional who oversees and executes email marketing strategies for a company. They are responsible for planning and implementing email campaigns, managing subscriber databases, creating engaging newsletters, and analyzing campaign performance. Their goal is to effectively reach the target audience, promote the brand, and drive customer engagement and sales through email communication.  

  

**What does an Email Marketer do?**  

An Email Marketer plays a crucial role in running successful email marketing campaigns. They identify the target audience, design and execute email campaigns, ensure the content is clear and error-free, and optimize email templates for mobile devices. They manage subscriber databases, analyze campaign metrics, and provide insights for improving campaign effectiveness. Additionally, they collaborate with other teams, such as content and design, to ensure consistent brand messaging and enhance customer communication through email channels.  

  

**Job brief**  

We are seeking a talented and experienced Email Marketer to spearhead our email marketing strategies.  

As the Email Marketer, you will be responsible for planning, executing, and optimizing end-to-end email marketing campaigns. This includes managing email databases, crafting engaging newsletters, and leveraging web technologies to drive sales growth.  

Your innovative ideas and deep understanding of customer engagement will be instrumental in promoting our brand, delivering valuable updates to our customers, and ensuring strong customer relationships.  

If you are passionate about email marketing and have a proven track record of success, we invite you to join our team and contribute to our company’s continued growth and success.  

  

**Responsibilities*** Identify target audience and grow our email list
* Design and implement direct email marketing campaigns
* Proofread emails for clarity, grammar and spelling
* Ensure mobile-friendly email templates
* Write newsletters including all company updates
* Upgrade our email templates using graphics, personalization and advanced features
* Ensure prompt and accurate communication with clients via email to minimize unsubscribes
* Create email databases for lead generation
* Analyze campaign performance and suggest improvements
* Report on sales revenue generated from email marketing efforts
* Ensure emails follow industry policies and best practices

  

**Requirements and skills*** Proven work experience as an Email marketer Digital marketing specialist
* Hands on experience with HTML and content management systems
* Proficiency in marketing automation technology
* Knowledge of SEO/SEM and Google Analytics
* Familiarity with analytical and database tools
* Excellent written communication and copywriting skills
* Strong project management skills
* An ability to work under tight deadlines
* BSc degree in Marketing or relevant field


We do not accept resume submissions from third party recruiters.




GCHmhDHFN9

title: Senior SEO Manager
description:
Hello there
-----------


Are you looking to do the best work of your career as a marketer? Do you want to be part of a hardworking and collaborative team that will push and motivate you? Do you get excited about gen AI, Google algo updates, passing core web vitals, building content hubs, and CRO?

  

If you answer yes, yes, and yes, keep reading - we’ve got something exciting for you.


Who we are
-----------


Hi, we’re Upgrow. We are a digital marketing agency focused on growth through Paid Media, SEO, and conversion-focused design and copywriting.

  

Our team is primarily remote but has shared office space with teammates in San Francisco and San Diego.

  

We focus mainly on B2B lead generation, driving marketing qualified leads and ultimately sales for our clients to help their business bottom line. Our mission is to accelerate growth for remarkable brands – we work with businesses focused on high growth and ready to blow things out of the water!

  

Here’s how you and Upgrow can get aligned based on our core values:

* **We Have Relentless Ownership**
	+ You are results-driven, naturally competitive, and thrive on the challenge to achieve performance results for our clients as well as our internal company goals
	+ This means you set appropriate expectations with clients and internally on meeting deadlines and ensure that quality work is delivered
	+ You understand and take ownership of the outcomes and can work collaboratively with the team in achieving that without making excuses or trying to sandbag
* **We Strive for Excellence**
	+ You take pride in your craft and strive for excellence in the quality of the work produced
	+ You can lead and set the standard of excellence for the team to ensure that our clients are impressed and overjoyed by the quality of work we do and produce
* **We are Committed to Growing & Learning**
	+ You are naturally curious and enjoy learning about the latest shifts in advertising trends/evolutions, technology advancements and product developments.
	+ You see the value in running training/mentoring, introducing/improving processes and knowledge sharing
* **We Win Together**
	+ You actively seek out to make yourself available to help, share knowledge and support your teammates
	+ You are a joy to work with through open/clear communication and following company’s systems/processes
	+ You celebrate and take joy not just in your own success, but the success of others

  

We’re a small and mighty team who’s fast growing (we’ve been Inc 5000 honoree twice now) and looking to grow into a world class leading agency, driving amazing results as marketers.


Many job descriptions are quick and generic, leaving you with lots of questions. This is meant to be a comprehensive look at the role, who it’s a good fit for, and how we operate as a company. With that disclaimer, you officially can’t get mad that it’s long!

  

Our application and hiring process is more in-depth than usual, and it is because we want to make sure you’re the right fit for us to ensure you’re set up for success here at Upgrow. So please take time to read and go through our hiring processes so you know what to expect.

  

If who we are sounds like a dream place to be, then you’ve come to the right place!


Life at Upgrow
---------------


We are mostly a remote team, with some hybrid in-office, our close-knit US and international team is spread across multiple US time zones, covering coast to coast. This means asynchronous communication is paramount in order to maximize productivity and efficiency.

  

We are a high performing team that values output and results, vs input and micromanagement. This means we get sh\\*t done, no bullsh\\*t, no politics, and no excuses.

  

We are highly collaborative and very organized, where we communicate internally primarily on Slack/Zoom, use project management tools like ClickUp, Basecamp and Confluence to ensure projects/tasks are planned out and delivered on time.

  

Every week we have company-wide meetings to sync together and get company level updates (e.g. sales, ops, people), and have short 15-minute daily team huddles to ensure everyone is aligned and not blocked.

  

For fun, we run monthly virtual happy hours, have in-person lunches (where possible) and have a dedicated Slack channel for non-work chatter so you can share your favorite emojis or photos from your weekend or vacation!


What will you do?
------------------


As a Senior SEO Manager, you will be the main point of contact for 5-8 key client accounts handling account management, strategy, and project management. After studying each client and their industry, you'll develop a strategy to achieve their performance goals, not just traffic but more importantly conversions.

  

You'll then project manage the implementation of on-page, off-page, and technical SEO with the support of an SEO Specialist, content writers, and the client. You will also provide reporting and project updates to clients in recurring meetings and handle client communications. As a senior manager, you will also contribute to our SEO playbook for how Upgrow executes SEO.

 **Must Haves:**

* **Great communication skills** - you are able to distill complex SEO concepts into easy to understand terms for clients (who may not be as SEO savvy) to understand, get buy-in and appreciate the value of what we’re doing
* **Highly organized & process driven** - you’re able to use project management tools to break out that tasks need to be done by when and by who, stay on top of multiple projects and ensure client delivery is met
* **Data driven** - you don’t just make guesses as to why metrics go up or down, but are comfortable diving deep and analyzing data (e.g. GA4, Search Console, SEMRush) in order to draw actionable insights and conclusions
* **Results driven** - you have a track record of achieving results, and if you’re not getting results, you have an insatiable appetite to identify opportunities, get client buy-in and execute. You know how to identify where the opportunities are in order to move the needle, and not be focused on just checking off a checklist (although those are important)
* **Embrace AI** - you have a working knowledge of utilizing AI tools such as ChatGPT to create content and craft compelling meta data
* **Data Integration** - you have a mastery over key SEO tools such as GA4, Search Console and SEMRush, have the ability to implement conversion tracking via Google Tag Manager, and be able to build data visualizations through Looker Studio
* **Real Experience** - you have a proven track record of SEO achievements, with typically 5+ years of experience across content, technical and on/off page
* **Competitive and Confident** - you want to be in the top 1% in your chosen field of SEO. You get competitive when you get outrank and find ways to win.
* **Passionate About SEO** - your YouTube history is filled with SEO content, you are in the SEO forums, you could talk for hours about this stuff, it’s more than a job - it’s what makes you great professionally.
* **SEO content writing and editing** - you can research and write compelling copy for search engines and users alike.

 **Nice To Have:**

* Experience in B2B SaaS/Enterprise technology
* Advanced knowledge of Google Tag Manager (using regex, datalayer, javascript)
* Web development skills (using HTML/CSS, Javascript)

  

These are our SEO tech stack:

* **Analytics:** GA4, Search Console, SEMRush, Google Tag Manager, SurferSEO
* **Business Intelligence:** Looker Studio, Supermetrics
* **AI:** ChatGPT

  

Our work hours are typically your standard 40/wk. Core working hours are 8:30am to 5:30pm in your time zone (except EST which is 9am to 6pm). This means during work hours, you are in a focused environment where you are dedicating your time and attention to Upgrow with a good internet connection and good work space.


Show me the money
------------------


Alright, let’s get to the point of why your time isn’t free but valuable. Here’s what we’re offering in exchange for your services:

  

* **Competitive base annual salary** -starting from $90,000**,** but it can really vary depending on your experience, background and readiness. We're considering a range of candidates for years of experience, work history, skills, and management track record. We can chat more on the topic upfront if you're interested.
* **High bonus potential!** Annual company profit sharing, client renewals and case study bonuses (can add 20%+ to your salary if you’re a high performer!)
* **Paid health, dental, and vision**
* **Life and disability insurance**
* **Unlimited PTO**, plus 10 company holidays
* **Sweet Company swag** that will quickly elevate your social status.


Is this a good fit for me?
---------------------------


Obviously, we're biased, but here is our honest (as can be) assessment of the pros/cons of working at Upgrow — in this role.

### **Benefits to you and your career**

* **Have an impact**
	+ Because we’re a small company, every single person matters in our team. You’re not some cog in a giant machine and the work that you do matters. We need people who have ideas to bring to the table and want to take action. This is your opportunity to step up to the plate and do things your way - this is the role in your career that you'll look back on fondly and know you created something truly special and innovative.
* **Work with genuinely good people**
	+ Did we mention we want to get sh\\*t done with no bullsh\\*t? We have no room for internal politics and egos – we desire to see our clients and our team succeed without the unnecessary hindrances
* **Huge career upside**
	+ Because we are small and nimble, we’re able to identify high performers and move them quickly into larger roles and responsibilities vs. traditional conventions. We have performance incentives in place to reward high achievers
* **Hybrid setup (San Diego)**
	+ We offer the flexibility of remote work plus the advantage of in-person work to foster enhanced collaboration, engagement and connectedness.

### **Who would NOT want to take this role**


A good match for any role requires a great fit between **team members and the company.** There are amazing people who aren’t in the right time/space in their careers to thrive and appreciate every role. . . and that’s totally ok! Just trying to keep it real here.


It might not be a good fit for you, IF:

* **You want to be told exactly what to do**
	+ While we have some processes documented and our team are not newbies, we need you to bring ideas to the table and make things better. That doesn't mean you're on your own or starting from 0, but we do want you to drive with ownership and accountability. So if you're looking for more of a straightforward execution role, this is not it.
* **You’re looking for a paycheck, not a career**
	+ If you’re looking for a simple 9-5 job to collect a paycheck, then this isn’t a place. We need people who are passionate about what they do, and have strong ownership and accountability. This means sometimes you’re working longer hours in order to get the job done and ensuring work produced is to a high quality/standard.
* **You’re looking for chill, slow and easy**
	+ Being in a small agency, we pride ourselves in our ability to be nimble and move quickly for our clients. This sometimes means pivoting and executing quickly, without having all the information in front of you. You need to have a sense of urgency, and not take your sweet time because you can’t handle the stress.
* **You play not to lose**
	+ We’re looking for people who want to play to win vs. not to lose. This means you’re looking for reasons and excuses on why you can’t achieve your goals vs. figuring out what is needed in order for you to achieve your goals.
* **You want a freelance style work schedule**
	+ If your schedule requires high flexibility or you prefer working exclusively in the middle of the night, then this probably isn't your gig. If you are backpacking across Europe with sometimes spotty wifi then you're also going to have a hard time.

### **How We Hire: A Look Inside Our Hiring Process**

* **Apply Online** - Now that you have found a position that you have matched your skills and interests it’s time to apply! You will be asked to submit a video response and answer a few questions about your background.
* **Application Review** - Applications are read first by our friendly recruiter and hiring manager. If we find that you are a potential match, we will reach out by email to schedule a call with you to learn more about your skills and experience.
* **Interviews** - Our interview process consists of 3 interviews, a questionnaire, and a case study presentation.
	+ Short conversation via Zoom video with our Administrator.
	+ Conversation with our co-founders. They will give you a feel for the role/company, and ask you some questions to better understand your background, experience, and fit.
	+ Questionnaire - We will ask you to complete a small (20-25 minute) questionnaire. (This helps us understand how you think and approach common SEO tasks.)
	+ Case Study Presentation- The final step will be to share a case study of a project you are particularly proud of that illustrates your SEO strategy, execution, and ability to get results. You'll share a few slides to highlight your case study with a few peers from our SEO team.
* **You’re in!**- After the interview process, we will review everything and make a decision as a team. If it's a great fit, we'll present you with an offer and review everything on a call. If you accept you'll be part of the team and begin planning for the onboarding process!




FUixQF61JP

title: Marketing Account Director- (Remote)
description:
**Are you an Account Executive / Account Director with B2B experience who’s looking for work that matters and a team who’s dedicated to doing great work?**

**Jairus Marketing, a full-service B2B marketing agency, focused on healthcare clients,** is expanding its Client Success team and it could be a great fit for your next role.

We have had unprecedented growth in the last year and are looking to build out a team of dedicated account managers / directors to serve as the conduit between our medical device / healthcare IT / medical service clients and our internal fulfillment team.

The role is a balance of calling out work to experts in copywriting, graphic design, digital marketing, and other skills and fulfilling on deliverables where your skills can really help the client.

**What does our ideal candidate look like?**

* An internal drive to do excellent work for your clients, every single time you can.
* MINIMUM 3-5 years of B2B Agency Account Management experience required
* Experience with healthcare clients, preferred
* Experience in effectively managing cross-functional teams, including brand strategy, creative, and technical resources for website development and online marketing campaigns
* Familiarity with the creative and strategic process, web development, social media, email marketing and online campaigns.
* An ability to manage multiple projects, deadlines, and changing priorities with grace.
* An ability to gather information needed and assemble project briefs for presentation to internal teams.
* Comfort working with individuals in all levels of the client organization, including strong skills interacting with senior-level management.
* An eagerness to work in a high-paced, start-up environment with tons of opportunity to grow and learn.

**What do we look like?**

We are a rapidly growing, completely remote organization with team members in 12 different states. We come together every day to provide a variety of digital and physical marketing deliverables for our clients. We’ve got a team of account managers, graphic designers, copywriters, paid ads specialists, and SEO experts who are all focused on serving our clients to the best of our abilities. We have a commitment to working with the most talented people possible, regardless of age, race, gender, height, weight, religion, national origin, handedness, or any other criteria that makes us all different and unique.

If you want to learn more about who we are and why we do what we do, check out this video of our CEO: https://bit.ly/3IlMMru

**Benefits to working at Jairus Marketing:**

* A growing team environment that is open to your ideas and encourages innovation.
* Market Competitive Salary, plus performance bonuses and upsells. Pay depends on skills and/or qualifications.
* Health, vision and dental insurance, paid time off, a cell phone stipend and a 401K.
* A remote work environment. We all work standard business hours based upon Central Time, but can do so from anywhere our journey takes us.
* You do need to bring your own laptop.
* Job Type: Full-time

**Jairus Marketing’s Core Values**

* *Christ-Driven:* While not a requirement or an encouragement for team members to espouse a certain faith tradition, we are committed to running the organization with Christian principles like the Golden Rule (Matthew 7:12) and a Commitment to Excellence (Colossians 3:23).
* *Committed to Excellence:* The work we do matters and we are affecting the well-being of others through our work. People rely on us to do amazing things and we want to honor that request.
* *Dedicated to the Team:* Marketing is a team sport, so it is important to help teammates out and to ask for help when you need it.
* *Being Better Than Yesterday:* Marketing is always changing. As an organization and as individuals, we want to always keep an eye on how to improve and serve our clients better.
* *Discerning in Ambiguity:* In marketing, you routinely find yourself in the gray zone, without perfect clarity on what the right answer is. Individually and as a team, we have to be comfortable in that space and in making the right decisions with limited information.

**EEO Statement**  
Jairus Marketing (and it’s sister company, iVelocity Marketing) is an equal opportunity employer without discrimination because of age, sex, color, national origin, marital status, veteran status, sexual orientation or presence of a disability. Pursuant to the Americans with Disabilities Act, the Fort Worden PDA will make reasonable accommodation of working conditions or methods in order to perform the duties of the position.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $65,000.00 - $85,000.00 per year

Benefits:

* 401(k)
* Dental insurance
* Flexible schedule
* Health insurance
* Paid time off
* Vision insurance

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift
* Monday to Friday

Experience:

* Agency: 3 years (Preferred)
* B2B Marketing: 1 year (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: VP of Marketing
description:
**Why you’ll love the job...**

The Honeyfund Hive (our members) is a community of fearless and authentic people in love, who are preparing to commit to and build a lasting marriage together. Honeyfund’s mission is to provide them with financial support, community, tools and information to succeed in planning an authentic wedding, taking a fantastic honeymoon, and building a successful marriage, with the help of their friends and family.

As **VP of Marketing**, your mission will be to continually grow and expand Honeyfund’s customer acquisition strategy, and collaborate with other teams on brand loyalty, repeat business and referrals.

You will take overall responsibility for the marketing results of the company, creating and executing strategies with your team of marketing specialists, which you will be responsible for growing and managing. You will be responsible for the customer journey including messaging, targeting, positioning, creative development and other marketing activities that communicate with, attract and engage paying customers. You will report directly to the CEO, sit on the leadership team, and bring input to the product and company strategy based on your results and analysis.

**Responsibilities:** 

* Marketing Planning – work directly with the CEO planning the company’s winning marketing strategy, with a 10x growth focus.
* Oversee these marketing functions:
* Digital Advertising – oversee digital ad campaigns that perform
* SEO – manage an agency or in-house SEO staff
* Content marketing -- Develop a content strategy that ensures Honeyfund is top of mind for wedding planning couples
* Influencer and affiliate marketing–ensure the company’s brand is well understood and promoted among influencers and affiliates
* Social Media – Oversee social media activities that create awareness and engagement across Instagram, Pinterest and others.
* Email Marketing/Marketing Automation – develop a workflow to effectively communicate with email contacts, grow lists and nurture subscribers throughout the customer lifecycle to drive repeat business.
* PR/Media Relations – Both owned and earned PR to communicate important company messaging to all stakeholders via an outsourced or internal PR team.
* Traditional Advertising –Where appropriate incorporate event, print, radio, and/or outdoor advertising.
* Management – continue to grow and develop Honeyfund’s superstar marketing team to execute and expand our marketing results.

**Why we’ll love you...**

* Growth capable - you’ve scaled a customer base by 10x minimum
* Agile and adaptable – someone who has thrived in marketing leadership blending creativity with hard data
* 8-10+ years of experience in marketing leadership showing increased responsibility over time
* Broad marketing experience including brand, growth, digital, communications, PR, etc.
* Data driven approach using insights to drive strategy
* Experience operating a fast-growing brand and bringing it to scale
* Leadership experience – focused on team development and growth
* Professional and proactive work ethic – a positive collaborator
* Proven ability to manage a budget to maximize ROI
* Ability to focus on top priorities and drive results
* Willing to roll up your sleeves and get stuff done as you grow the team
* Tech proficient – able to manage team members who use marketing technology that powers e-mail management, social media, SEO, analytics, tag management, and marketing automation
* Bachelor’s degree or higher in business, marketing, communications, or related field
* You thrive working from home
* High competence in project and stakeholder management
* Excellent interpersonal, written and oral communication skills

**Experience we'd love you to have...**

title: Marketing Specialist (Remote)
description:
Authority Brands Inc. headquartered in Columbia, MD is a leading provider of home services, building brands that support the success of our franchisees, as well as bettering the lives of the homeowners we serve and the people we employ.
  
  

The Marketing Specialist will assist in overall marketing efforts within the Sure Start Marketing program for the Trade Brands. This role is an integral part of the planning and execution of business pre-open and post-open marketing strategies aimed at viable leads to our newest franchise partners.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

* Work with Sure Start Marketing Manager, Trade Brands Marketing Managers, operations teams, and greater Authority Brands team to outline, plan and execute strategic marketing plan and initiatives for the Trade Brands.
* Help franchise partners develop and manage local marketing budgets.
* Move projects from ideation through to completion, and track status of projects.
* Be knowledgeable about trends in brands’ data including lead flow, booking rate, close rate, and other KPIs. Understand marketing’s contribution to these KPIs and actively contribute to their improvement with the marketing team.
* Complete research and present recommendations for marketing naming conventions, based on franchise-partner local market needs and trends.
* Help manage brands’ websites, including working with website partners, vendors, and internal teams to ensure accuracy of brand information, approval of franchisee submitted content, implement franchisees’ requested changes, and new location website launches, digital footprint pieces and creative graphic requests.
* Complete online presence audits to ensure consistency across online presence for franchise locations.
* Support marketing team in the analysis of marketing performance and results and help communicate these to franchise partners and other teams.
* Assist in onboarding new franchise partners and introduce them to the marketing system and available assets and strategies and provide ad hoc strategic support.
* Develop and manage franchisee-facing content such as weekly meeting agendas, task checklists, training and other educational items.
* Interact with franchise partners, vendors and internal teams, serving as a guide and project manager during their onboarding process. Develop best practices for cross-brand collaboration and sharing.


**Qualifications:**  

* Self-motivated, results-oriented, confident, and passionate.
* Comfortable with creating new processes, establishing organization and structure in environments without much existing process and structure.
* Knowledge/understanding of digital marketing, including ability to interpret digital campaign results (SEO, PPC, remarketing, display).
* Excellent problem-solving skills.
* Energetic, open to collaborative and dynamic environment, business minded, strategic and creative.
* Public presentation skills, targeted at influencing audiences to achieve company goals.
* Open to both receiving and giving constructive feedback in a professional manner and context.
* Remaining open-minded to ongoing and dynamic change, as market trends, company shifts, and resource alternations occur.
* Keeping our franchise partners’ business success at the forefront of our why and our how.


We believe our greatest assets are our employees, we offer competitive salaries and a full benefits package to include, PTO, paid holidays, 401(k) and more.
  
  

Authority Brands Inc. conducts drug screens and background checks on applicants who accept employment offers. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions however we do not sponsor Visa’s at this time.
  
  

Authority Brands Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer

title: Digital Marketing - SEO Specialist
description:
Caputo Design is a fast-growing Technology and Internet Marketing Agency. We provide Web Design, Development, SEO, PPC, Social Media and internet marketing services for small and large businesses. We are looking to hire an ambitious individual who wants work with fantastic clients and grow with a great team all from the comfort of your own home!

**About You:**

* **Independent:** You enjoy working without a boss looking over your shoulder and are driven to create your own success. Together we will create a plan and define what success looks like.
* **Always Learning:** You have a desire to push the limits and are always striving to learn new things. We support new ideas and constant curiosity that can take you to the next level.
* **Detail Oriented:** You have an insane desire to make sure everything is perfect and you take great pride in your work.
* **Wear Many Hats:** While this position will have basic requirements to get started, we are looking for a team player that wants to learn all aspects of the business. If you have a passion for design, we want to use that. If your passion is on the development side, we want to figure out how to let you tap into that as well. Your main focus will be as an SEO Specialist but the possibilities are endless.

**Requirements:**

* At least 5 years of experience with SEO & local SEO (Google + Local)
* Be able to maintain normal office hours in a quiet working environment with a fast internet connection
* Love being part of a virtual team atmosphere
* Experience with clients from a Franchise based business a plus
* Solid understanding of WordPress admin environment
* Expert knowledge of Google Analytics & Google Search Console
* Comfortable conducting client calls one-on-one
* Maintain and continuously optimize client accounts
* Provide internal and external reporting with regards to the status of a project and how client and company goals are being met
* Extract insights from multiple sources (e.g. Google Search Console, Google Analytics, SEM Rush, Moz, our own custom reports, etc.) in order to identify and provide well developed and impactful recommendations
* Must be detail oriented and very thorough with your work
* Need to be able to thrive in a fast pace environment
* Must be a quick learner
* Passion for Internet Marketing is a must!

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $50,000.00 - $55,000.00 per year

Benefits:

* Dental insurance
* Health insurance
* Paid time off
* Vision insurance

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday

Application Question(s):

* You notice a reduction in conversion rate on a clients website. What are the first few things to check that could be a cause?
* If we told you have 3 hours to work on a website. What are the first things you would do within those hours to optimize for organic search?
* What is your desired salary range?

Education:

* High school or equivalent (Preferred)

Experience:

* SEO: 5 years (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: Account Executive, Digital Marketing
description:
**Position Summary**


MyAdvice is hiring true hunters/closers ready to break into the lucrative digital marketing sales industry by consulting with medical practitioners on our cutting edge, proprietary SaaS marketing platform. Account Executives are responsible for elevating MyAdvice by ultimately helping our clients grow through a robust online presence. This is an experienced sales position meaning you must be familiar with digital marketing and have robust closing and hunting experience. This is a high volume, outbound, hunter sales role where you’ll be expected to source new business from scratch while owning the full sales cycle.


MyAdvice's Account Executives (AEs) will identify ideal client profiles, assess the practice’s unique online marketing needs then cater outreach to capitalize on selling a feature suite that maximizes value. AEs will accomplish this by exercising proven sales acumen to act as the authority on medical marketing concepts by utilizing their extensive MyAdvice product knowledge, excellent technical skills and strong understanding of industry trends. Successful AEs are skilled communicators and presenters who find the best fit between client and platform features.


Our ideal candidate is one who works well under pressure, is highly self-motivated and easily initiates relaxed, yet informative, two-way conversations with prospects. They are coachable, adaptable, tenacious, excellent multitaskers and organized. The right candidate is able to convey potentially unfamiliar technical concepts to prospective clients in an easy-to-understand manner. They’re focused on enhancing the buyer experience and comfortable challenging prospects to ensure results. Ultimately, our best fit for Account Executive is one that’s passionate about not only their own personal excellence, but also their client’s success.


MyAdvice is proud to offer its sales team robust support. Your sales manager isn’t afraid to “get their hands dirty” by working 1:1 on skills development, offering custom coaching and actually demonstrating what it takes to close a deal. You’ll enjoy further mentorship by seasoned MyAdvice sales professionals that’ve been with our company over a decade. We also have a tuition reimbursement program and a well-defined career path from AE to Senior Account Executive. Product knowledge training and sales skills coaching is backed by a solid tech stack to prioritize your time on outreach and closing. While you’re expected to hunt your own leads, you'll also be supported by an in-house marketing team and dedicated lead generation specialist.

* **This position can be remote, hybrid or in-office depending on candidate preference and location.** MyAdvice has offices in Melville, New York and Lehi, Utah.

**Essential Duties**

* Passionately present MyAdvice platform features to new prospects to generate new sales
* Educate prospects through a consultative sales approach paired with a transactional close process
* Grow business by calling on marketing leads and self-generating new prospects
* Demonstrate comprehensive product and industry knowledge to articulate value to prospects
* Hold yourself accountable to and carry a quota of net-new closed revenue
* Maintain pipeline management through sales software
* Collaborate with others on the sales and marketing teams to ensure goal attainment
* Relentlessly drive to achieve personal and company goals
* Maintain a positive and resilient attitude
* Perform other duties as assigned

**Tech Stack + Resources**

* MacBook, monitor and headset provided
* Apollo (lead database)
* Zoom (video conferencing)
* TalkDesk (softphones system)
* Pipedrive (Sales-specific CRM)
* PandaDoc (contract processing software)
* Dedicated in-house marketing team providing inbound marketing leads
* In-house lead generation specialist providing high quality, curated lead lists that meet company ICP
* Sales skill development, custom coaching plan and training on industry best practices

**Required Skills**

* Strong interpersonal skills; must be able to negotiate, problem-solve, make decisions and act as the authority on MyAdvice’s platform of marketing features and services
* Exceptional oral and written communication skills
* Demonstrated business acumen and a deep understanding of sales processes
* Well versed in CRM, presentation, video conferencing and other business software
* Medical, dental or marketing sales experience (preferred)

**Required Qualifications**

* Minimum of 3-5 years of account executive, B2B sales, outside sales or territory sales experience
* Must have a working knowledge of digital marketing concepts; minimum 2 years experience
* Bachelor’s degree in Sales, Marketing, Communications or related field *preferred*
* Must have reliable internet, phone and a professional, quiet/private workplace
* Legally authorized to hold employment within the United States

**Position Details**

* Schedule: Monday-Friday, typical business hours (early-out Fridays!)
	+ For example: 8am-5pm or 9am-6pm with an hour lunch break
	+ Flexible scheduling available per manager’s approval
	+ Occasional after-hours work may be required depending on prospect’s availability
* Travel: May require occasional local or national travel (less than 5% of the time, if at all).
* Physical Requirements: Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer (90% at desk, 10% of time walking); Ability to lift up to 30 lbs and use typical office equipment (computers, keyboards, printer, etc.)

**Benefits Package**

* Employer Contributed Plans: Medical, Vision, Life and AD+D Insurances
* Voluntary Plans: Dental, Critical Illness, Accident and Pet Insurances
* Unlimited Paid Time Off + 12 Paid Holidays
* Remote-first Company, Flexible Schedules + Early Out Fridays!
* 401(k) Plan with 50% Company Match (up to 6%)
* Employee Assistance Program (free mental health services, financial/legal consultations and more!)
* Tuition Reimbursement Program (up to $1,800 annually) and Executive Mentorship Program
* Leadership Training Program: Learn the basics of how to lead a team! Available to all employees.
* Ongoing Personalized Coaching and Career Development
* Casual Dress and Fun Work Environment (games, coffee, snacks, etc.)
* Perks at Work Employee Discount Program
* Core Value "Pay It Forward" Initiative, Project Fantastic (client collab) and more!

**MyAdvice**
MyAdvice empowers business owners and professionals to increase their revenue by attracting and retaining more clients through digital marketing. The SaaS-based platform enables hands-on control and visibility into performance of online marketing activities, backed by 20+ years of best practices and expertise on how to maximize those efforts. MyAdvice’s six-stage Pyramid of Success™ provides a proven step-by-step plan for how and when to implement growth-oriented marketing tactics for greatest impact, including website design and maintenance, local directories, client reviews, social media, search engine optimization (SEO) and paid advertising. Learn more at myadvice.com.


We are committed to diversity and inclusion as we understand and value its importance to our success. Our team thrives upon our employee's unique experiences to propel creative solutions, so we aspire to continue building upon our diverse team to include groups that are traditionally underrepresented. Additionally, studies have shown that minorities are less likely to apply for a position if they don't meet every qualification. MyAdvice prioritizes a strong company culture fit and believes in providing opportunities to individuals with exceptional work ethic. Skills can be taught. With that in mind, if you believe yourself to be a good fit, we strongly encourage people of all backgrounds to apply.


MyAdvice is a performance based and data driven company that has experienced tremendous growth within the last year, so we're excited for the opportunity to introduce new talent. MyAdvice’s progressive values include transparency, teamwork, relentless effort and intellectual honesty in order to bring about the success of our clients. We encourage continuous education, career development and work/life balance while thriving in a casual and collaborative work environment. With MyAdvice you will be a valued and integral member whom we will continually invest.

title: Social Media Marketing Manager
description:
**Job Summary:**
================

  

The Social Media Marketing Specialist will develop and implement the company's web-based marketing strategy to promote the company's brand, attract visitors and potential leads, and generate internet sales.  



  

***Supervisory Responsibilities:***
===================================

* None.

**Duties/Responsibilities:**
----------------------------

* Plans and implements web-based marketing strategies and campaigns via the company's website(s).
* Collaborates with web development and design teams; provides guidance on marketing-related aspects of the company's web presence.
* Develops and expands company's web presence through social media, email, web advertising, and other online sources; promotes company brand through these channels.
* Drafts, implements, maintains, and revises online marketing campaigns to drive sales and revenue to the company.
* Manage day-to-day running of all social platforms (primarily, Solex website, Instagram, IG Stories, Facebook, Tik Tok, X, LinkedIn, Pinterest, YouTube, and Mail Chimp Newsletter)
* Stay Up-to-date knowledge of all current social media platforms and trends.

* Respond to customer reviews and comments across all social media channels.

* Craft and implement social media strategies that defy convention and capture attention.

* Strategize and implement lead generation campaigns to further grow the business.
* Collaborates with web design, development, and content staff to monitor and improve search engine optimization (SEO) results for the company's site(s).

 **Physical Requirements:**

* Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer.
