title: Brand Experience Specialist
description:
About the position::
**Velosio is looking for a** **Brand Experience** **Specialist** **to be an integral member of the Marketing Team.**  

As the Brand Experience Specialist at Velosio, you will assume the responsibility of amplifying our brand's prominence across various channels, including social media, blog publishing, and public relations. Your primary duty will be to ensure that our content aligns seamlessly with the core values and essence of our brand, is pleasing to the reader and consistently achieving set performance metrics.
Collaborating closely with the Director of Digital Marketing and the Demand Generation team, your tasks will involve formulating strategies, monitoring outcomes, and making evidence-based modifications to enhance our operational efficacy. A candidate must be comfortable with interviewing subject matter experts and creating short-form content that can be shared.  

The ideal candidate will possess an intense ambition to not merely fulfill the duties of this role but to refine and elevate it, further solidifying Velosio's stature in the marketplace. This individual will approach our social and blog platforms with a meticulous eye, viewing them as direct reflections of their professional dedication and exacting standards. They must also exhibit a profound commitment to balancing support for our demand generation team and accomplishing their own initiatives. Absolute professionalism, dedication, and a positive, collaborative mindset are requisites for this position.  

We're on the hunt for someone who's not just looking for a job, but a journey—a journey dotted with challenges, triumphs, and endless opportunities to shine. Bring your zest, your zeal, and that unbeatable positive vibe, and let's redefine digital branding together!
Who we are::

At Velosio, we focus on what matters most - **our people.** We are a values-driven organization committed to delivering an outstanding employee experience to all our team members.  

Velosio’s years of experience with business applications translate to a deep bench of tenured team members with competency across enterprise resource management (ERP), customer relationship management (CRM), and cloud services.  

We have earned recognition from Microsoft as a top 1% performing partner worldwide and an emerging NetSuite leader. We have strategic independent software vendor (ISV) partnerships and a portfolio of solution and service offerings to accelerate what’s next for business.  

Our mission is to enable clients to realize business value faster, simplify the process of deploying technology, acquire deeper data-driven insights, and explore ongoing innovation to drive business forward. We support the entire Microsoft Dynamics portfolio, Office 365 family and Azure services. Velosio is the only Microsoft Cloud Distributor that specializes in Dynamics 365 and is a prominent Microsoft Master VAR. Headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, Velosio’s 400 employees serve over 4,000 clients.  

Beyond our expertise, as a Velosio team member, you can leverage the Velosio award winning culture - a network of top-notch peers, day-to-day flexibility, career development resources and the largest incentive opportunities in the industry.
Your day might look like::
**1. Social Media Management:**
===============================

* Spearhead creative development for social campaigns.
* Conduct interviews with Subject Matter Experts to bolster content.
* Oversee daily social media activities: crafting captivating graphics/posts, brainstorming content, and content generation.
* Engage with, moderate, and respond to audience comments and messages.
* Enhance and manage social media profiles for optimal presence.
* Stay abreast with current social media trends, technologies, and best practices.
* Lead the strategy and growth trajectory for Velosio's social media platforms.
* Partner with the Demand Generation team to design tailored social strategies in sync with business goals.
* Ideate, plan and execute innovative social media campaigns to produce content that resonates with our target audiences and grows an engaged following.
* Tap into innovative methods and monitor emerging trends to expand social media reach and engagement.
* Oversee the editorial calendar, ensuring its alignment with brand objectives and best practices.
* Content production: Canva or Adobe experience to produce compelling social graphics.
* Ability to write compelling marketing copy for emails, social media

**2. Blog Oversight:**
======================

* Curate, publish and optimize content across 5 Velosio website properties.
* Ability to publish, enrich and optimize one to two posts per day.
* Collaborate with Demand Generation Managers and Practice Leaders to curate pertinent content topics.
* Ensure blogs are aesthetically pleasing, search engine optimized and categorized correctly.
* Edit content as necessary to tweak writing and layout for best results.

**3. Velosio Social Mavens Representation:**
============================================

* Personify Velosio's Social Mavens in the digital realm.
* Engage with VSMs, transforming conversations into compelling posts.

**4. Video Channel Management**
===============================

* Oversee Velosio’s YouTube channels: manage video content from publication to optimization.

**5. Third-Party Reference Site Management**
============================================

* Supervise and refine local listings (e.g., Google My Business, Yelp).
* G2, Clutch, Software Advice, GoodFirms, etc…
* Strategize and implement content plans for third-party forums (e.g., industry publications, Quora, Reddit).
* Oversee and optimize listings on software selection sites.


What you'll bring::
* 2+ years’ experience in B2B digital marketing and social media, preferably within the technology arena.
* 
* Bachelor’s degree required in (preferably) Computer Science, Communications, New Media, Public Relations, or Marketing/Business Administration.
* Strong familiarity with the business applications of social media platforms (LinkedIn, YouTube, Twitter)
* In-depth understanding of digital platforms and trends.
* Experience with Canva or Adobe Suite
* Experience with SEO and page layout
* Strong analytical and strategic skills.
* Proactive, innovative, and able to adapt to rapidly changing digital landscapes
* Understanding of social media metrics; able to interpret the results and take action to increase the effectiveness of social media campaigns
* Strong written and verbal communication skills
* Can manage multiple initiatives at the same time.
* Team player who can work across an organization to build a plan, get alignment, and execute.


Some reasons you might like working with us::

At Velosio, **YOU MATTER.**

  



Due to our proven commitment to delivering an exemplary employee experience, Velosio was awarded **Best Company Culture**, **Best Company for Diversity**, **Best CEO**, and **Best Company for Women** by Comparably in 2022 and 2021, in addition to **Best Company for Career Growth**, **Best Perks & Benefits**, and **Best Leadership Team** by Comparably in 2022.

  



Access the following link to see why **100%** of current Velosio team members feel their company is invested in their career growth, **99%** of current Velosio employees feel their manager cares about them as a person, and **99%** of current Velosio team members look forward to interacting with their coworkers every day:


https://www.comparably.com/companies/velosio

  

At Velosio, **YOUR WELLNESS MATTERS.**

  

We know one size doesn't fit all, which is why we offer a comprehensive benefits package that allows our team members to create a personalized plan best suited for their unique needs, including:


* 5 Medical Insurance options with a company contribution to HSA
* 3 Dental Insurance options including adult orthodontics
* 2 Vision Insurance options
* PTO with added time with each year of service
* Remote working environment
* 401k Match 50% of the first 6%
* StayWell Program – a cash reimbursement up to $600 a year toward Wellness
* Quarterly Incentive Program

title: SEO Specialist
description:
**About us**

We are agile, professional, creative and our goal is to Create a national SEO marketing agency.

Our work environment includes:

* Modern office setting
* Food provided
* Growth opportunities
* Growth opportunities

Applicant must have previous experience with all of the following:

* Developing SEO strategies for local and national campaigns
* Improving client website’s authoritativeness
* Optimizing on-site elements (keyword research, internal linking, website structure, title/meta/header optimization, etc.)
* Implementing off-page SEO strategies (local citations, backlink development, and online PR
* Performing website audits and updates (site speed, index management, 3XX redirects, 4XX errors, robots.txt, sitemaps)
* Researching relevant keywords
* Tracking KPIs, and rankings, and recommend tactics
* Analyzing competitor websites
* Knowledge of using content management systems (CMS) such as WordPress to optimize websites
* Familiarity with conversion rate optimization (CRO)
* Knowledge of UX best practices and responsive design
* Familiarity with web analytics and reporting tools
* Experience with SEO tools: ahrefs, Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Screaming Frog, Rank Math

- Conducting keyword research and analysis to identify target keywords and optimize website content

- Implement on-page SEO strategies including optimizing metadata, headings, and content structure

- Monitor and analyze website performance using Google Analytics and other SEO tools

- Develop and implement link building strategies to improve website authority

- Collaborate with web developers to ensure SEO best practices are implemented during website development and updates

- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and changes in search engine algorithms

- Provide recommendations for website improvements based on SEO analysis

- Track, report, and analyze website rankings and organic traffic

Experience:

- Proven experience as an SEO Specialist or similar role

- In-depth knowledge of SEO principles, techniques, and best practices

- Familiarity with CSS and HTML coding for on-page optimization

- Proficiency in using Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and other SEO tools

- Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions

- Experience with conversion optimization strategies to improve website performance

- Knowledge of link building techniques and strategies

- Familiarity with web design principles and user experience optimization

- Experience in social media management for SEO purposes

If you are a detail-oriented individual with a passion for SEO and a strong understanding of search engine algorithms, we would love to hear from you. Join our team of experts and help drive organic traffic and improve search engine rankings for our clients' websites. Apply now!

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift
* Monday to Friday
* Weekends as needed

Work Location: Remote

title: SEO Specialist For Boutique Marketing Agency
description:
**The job in one sentence**

We seek someone with a proven track record of SEO expertise to work closely with our SEO director so our boutique marketing agency can continue to deliver exceptional results for our clients.

**About Us**

Our agency (MarketingForTherapists.org) is a leading agency in our niche of providing online marketing services to mental health therapists. We’re a fully remote team, and we have a mix of part-time and full-time team members. We believe in driving great results for our clients while taking great care of our people.

Beyond our impact on their bottom line, our clients appreciate our commitment to

* Transparency (we give all the information they need to make an informed choice and don't resort to pushiness or hard sells)
* Ethics (we don't work with unlicensed therapists or those who use ineffective psuedoscientific treatments) and
* Trustworthiness (we don't recommend services that we don't think will benefit the client, and we don't recommend a more expensive service when a cheaper one would do just fine.)

Turns out, when you’re committed to doing the right thing, therapists want to hire you. We’ve been growing quickly, and we’re ready to expand our SEO team. That’s where you come in.

**The Job**

In collaboration with our SEO director, you’ll identify client needs and deliver SEO services for the therapist clients in your portfolio. You will have primary responsibility for implementing SEO optimizations, reporting, and client relationship management. Specifically, the core duties of the role are:

* Choose and apply appropriate onsite and offsite optimizations
* Generate performance reports using Semrush, Google Analytics and other SEO tools
* Provide analysis and recommendations to the client based on performance data
* Track completion of deliverables and provide ongoing verification of completed work to the SEO director and the client
* Manage client relationships by responding promptly to client communication and taking initiative to address client needs.
* Collaborate with other members of the agency team to cross-sell services and unify marketing strategy for the client.
* Deliver best-in-class quality of service that drives verifiable results - not creating pretty graphs or doing tweaks that have no impact on the client's bottom line.

This role gives you full autonomy over your day-to-day work and there’s a lot of room for scaling up your SEO ability or growing the role in a way that fits your career goals. The more initial experience you bring, and the faster you demonstrate excellence, the more you’ll be able to take on. Over time, you may gain the ability to design new services offerings for clients or spearhead strategic initiatives. Basically - if you're doing an awesome job, there's a lot of room for this role to expand.

**What It Takes**

There are two major pieces this job requires. One piece is professionalism - can you manage your time effectively, communicate well with clients, and be proactive to put your best foot forward? You can prove this to us based on how you present during your application and interview.

The other piece is the SEO expertise. We’re not interested in offering our clients smoke and mirrors, so we need a specialist who can design and implement a strategy that actually gets results. It’s okay if you’re not an expert on everything, but you should have the basics down cold. If your resume doesn't include meaningful work as an SEO specialist (preferably local SEO), this position unfortunately won't be a fit for you.

Agency experience is strongly preferred. Bonus points if you have experience working with small businesses that sell services to consumers, especially in the mental health or medical space.

**The Application Process**

We’re looking to hire immediately, although we can wait for the right person. Our process involves 1-2 rounds of interviews as well as a paid work sample. Including a cover letter, sending a personalized message through our website, or highlighting specific experience that fits our needs are easy ways to stand out.

**Other Details**

* Starting pay ranges from $30 to $45 per hour depending on experience. You’ll get a $5/hr increase after the first three months, and further raises or bonuses are possible depending on how you’re able to help us scale the SEO revenue for the business. You'll be paid via direct deposit at the end of the month.
* Hours required will vary based on client demand and which responsibilities you own. You’ll likely start with 5-10 hours per week, but should easily be able to scale up to 15 - 30 hours per week, and 30-40 hours is possible.
* This is a 1099 contractor position and offers no benefits.
* Completely flexible schedule - as long as you hit your deadlines and respond to emails within a reasonable timeframe, you can arrange your work however you like.
* Open to US or Canadian residents.
* Immediate start preferred, but could delay for the right candidate.

Job Types: Part-time, Full-time

Salary: $30.00 - $45.00 per hour

Job Types: Full-time, Part-time

Pay: $30.00 - $45.00 per hour

Benefits:

* Flexible schedule

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday

Application Question(s):

* A therapist's website has been online for six weeks, but their Google Analytics is reporting zero organic traffic. What are three possible reasons? (This is a screening question, so no need to spend too much time on it.)

Experience:

* SEO: 1 year (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: Google Local Service Ads Specialist
description:
Our growing SEO Digital Marketing Agency is looking for a Google Local Services Ads Specialist who will play an integral role in developing and implementing Local Services Ads (LSAs) strategies for clients in the legal, medical, and home services sectors. The right candidate for the role will have a deep understanding of the intricacies of all forms of Google paid search ads, including LSAs, and a proven track record of success in driving results for businesses in similar industries.


BluShark prides itself on being an agency that puts its clients first as strategic partners. At BluShark Digital, we believe our core values of innovation, collaboration, and a focus on our greater community help us reach our goals and guide us in the right direction. We are dedicated to developing creative, practical, and successful Search Engine Optimization solutions for businesses, no matter their size or practice. Located in the heart of Washington, D.C., we work to help businesses stand out online and we bring more than just leads – we bring results.


We have identified the following characteristics as important to succeed in this role:

* In-depth knowledge of Google Local Services Ads (LSAs) best practices and the ability to stay updated on platform changes.
* Proficiency in using paid advertising platforms such as Google Ads.
* Passion for testing new strategies to try to improve performance and increase return on ad spend.
* Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to make informed decisions.


Key Responsibilities of a Local Services Ads Specialist

* Develop and execute comprehensive Local Service Ads strategies tailored to clients in the legal, medical, and home services industries
* Conduct thorough industry research to stay abreast of trends and changes affecting LSAs.
* Create, optimize, and manage Local Service Ads campaigns across various platforms, ensuring maximum visibility and performance
* Conduct keyword research and analysis to identify target audience and optimize ad copy and landing pages for maximum conversion
* Monitor and analyze campaign performance, provide regular reporting, and recommend changes to improve performance


Our Hiring Process:

* Selected candidates will participate in a quick, 15-minute introductory call (an opportunity to make a great first impression)
* Top applicants will be invited for an interview with the hiring manager
* Finalists will be invited back for a shadow, offering insight into the position’s day to day responsibilities.


Benefits:

* Compensation commensurate with experience with high opportunity for growth
* Work from home (Remote flexibility)
* 15 Days PTO
* Additional 2 Days PTO for Social Action / Volunteer Time
* Health Insurance (Medical, Vision, Dental)


Our process takes a great deal of time for us, and we ask you to dedicate yours as well. BluShark is devoted to recruiting talented team members who can grow in their positions and flourish within the firm by displaying a dedication to high performance, self-discipline, and motivation to gain more responsibility.


BluShark Digital is committed to a work environment in which all individuals are treated with respect and dignity. Each individual has the right to work in a professional atmosphere that promotes equal employment opportunities and prohibits unlawful discriminatory practices, including harassment. BluShark Digital provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws.

title: SEO & Adwords Expert
description:
**Webmaster for Google Adwords, Search Console, SEO, My Business, Moz, and other online management tools.**  

  

**WHO WE ARE:**  

eatOSis a cloud-based restaurant software start-up that provides Point of Sale, Self-Service Kiosks, Mobile, Online Ordering, Scheduling, Inventory Management, and more. We are on a mission to disrupt the market of old, slow, expensive systems and bring innovative products to restaurants worldwide. **WHAT DO WE SEEK:*** Natural problem solvers who take initiative and who have the ambition to become a leader at our company.
* We need your passion expertise to help us build the eatOS brand.
* We have built a fun workplace culture with a strong team that comes together to bring 100% of what they do.

  

**We’re looking for amazing talent to add to our team as an SEO / Web Specialist.**  

This position is best suited for someone experienced on-page, off-page, and technical SEO. We’re looking for an SEO specialist that lives and breaths SEO and is always learning and up to date with the latest SEO practices and Google Algorithm changes.  

  

Our team is incredibly passionate, smart, supportive, skilled, open to learning, happy to take constructive criticism and use it to level up. We’re looking for someone who can match that energy and help us scale it.  

  

**ABOUT THE ROLE:**  

This person will lead the SEO strategy for multiple clients monitoring and reporting their SEO efforts adapting and executing new strategies to continue boosting our client's ranking.  

  

This is a part-time remote position. We require a steady internet connection and a mandatory overlap of working hours with the rest of the team.  

  

**RESEARCH:*** Target Market Analysis.
* Keyword Research and Analysis.
* Website Audit.
* Backlink Analysis.
* Competitor Analysis.
* Strategy Development.

 **ANALYTICS:*** Google Analytics Setup and Management.
* Facebook Pixel Setup and Management.
* Google Search Console / Bing Webmasters Verification and Management.
* Rankings and Visibility Tracking and Analysis.
* UTM Management.
* MOZ PRO.

  

**SEO Technical Optimization:*** Indexing and Crawlability Optimization.
* Redirect Optimization.
* URL Structure Optimization.
* Structured Data/Rich Snippets Optimization.
* Mobile Responsiveness Optimization.
* Page Speed Optimization.
* Schema Mark-Up Audit.
* SEO On-Page Optimization.
* Keyword Strategy.
* Ensures that all web pages have keyword-optimized tags.
* URL Optimization.
* Tag Optimization.
* Content Optimization.
* Website Speed Optimization.
* SEO Off-Page Optimization:
* Negative Backlink Audit and Repair.
* Link Creation (Branding + Reputation).
* Link Acquisition.
* Content Marketing.

 **PLATFORMS KNOWLEDGE:*** semrush.com.
* kwfinder.com / ubersuggest.com.
* screamingfrog / surferseo.com.
* gtmetrix.com.
* Google search console.
* Google Analytics.
* Google data studio.
* Google pagespeed tool.
* Google Optimize.
* Google Tag Manager.
* All social media channels.
* Google Adwords.
* WordPress
* Shopify.
* WebMaster.
* Zapier.

  

**BONUS SKILL:*** Development.
* Copywriting.

  

**WORKING ENVIRONMENT*** Remote, time zone depending on location.
* Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance Contribution.
* Competitive Salary and the chance to be a part of something big.

  

**HOW TO APPLY:**  

Send us "I Love SEO" at the beginning of your cover letter so we know that you've read the entire job description. Write to us about why do you think you are the best candidate for this role, and if you are able, send us case studies of your previous work.  

  

  

**About eatOS POS Inc.:**  

  

eatOS was born in 2017 to help restaurants manage their business and serve customers better. Since inception, it has grown to offer cross segment of products and services that allow restaurants across the country to manage and operate their businesses more efficiently. At the same time, enabling restaurants to leverage technology to save on costs and connect with guests in a more authentic and engaging way.

title: Ecommerce Marketing Specialist (REMOTE)
description:
### **Where A-Players Thrive.**



We’re an employee-owned, vertically-integrated builder of some of America’s most popular health & wellness brands. With over 1,200 team members dedicated to improving the lives of people and their pets, we create best-in-class products that bring health and happiness. Our creative content educates the world on making smarter health choices, while the brands we own generate over $1 billion of revenue annually.

**We’re Looking For An:** Ecommerce Marketing Specialist that is responsible for elevating the brand presence across digital platforms and implementing effective online marketing strategies to boost conversions. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align marketing efforts with overall business objectives. Utilize data analytics and market research to identify opportunities for website optimization and improved user engagement. Plan and execute targeted online marketing campaigns across various channels, including social media, email, and paid advertising.


**Location:** Remote (Woodland Hills, CA)


**What You’ll Be Doing:**


* Develop and implement digital & ecommerce marketing strategies to increase brand awareness and drive traffic to our branded website
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop campaigns that are aligned with brand goals and growth opportunities.
* Manage and optimize branded website to enhance user experience, increase sales, and maximize conversion rates.
* Conduct thorough analysis of website performance metrics and user behavior to identify opportunities for improvement and optimization.
* Implement A/B testing and other conversion rate optimization techniques to enhance website performance and drive revenue growth.
* Understanding ability to make recommendations/manage online marketing tactics including SEO & SEM.
* Implement necessary changes to improve site performance.
* Monitor industry trends and competitor activities to identify new opportunities and stay ahead of the curve in digital marketing and ecommerce.
* Collaborate with creative teams to develop engaging content, including product descriptions, imagery, and multimedia assets, for online platforms.
* Utilize data analytics tools to track and measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and initiatives and provide actionable insights for continuous improvement.
* Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and best practices in digital marketing, ecommerce, and website merchandising, and propose innovative strategies to drive results.


**Preferred Qualifications (Note: These are preferred and not required. We strongly encourage you to apply even if you don’t tick ALL of these boxes.):**


* Comfortable using insights/analytics to measure campaign effectiveness.
* Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
* Strong project management skills.
* Knowledge of conversion rate optimization principles.
* Familiarity with online marketing channels.
* Adaptability to evolving marketing strategies and environments.
* Ability to drive brand strategy execution to achieve business goals.
* Bachelor's degree required.
* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field preferred.
* 2 years of experience in digital marketing and ecommerce background.


**Golden Perks & Benefits:**


* Health and Happiness: Enjoy 100% employer-paid medical, dental, and vision insurance. Get 75% premium coverage for dependents.
* Become an Owner: Join our Employee Stock Ownership Plan and be a part owner of Golden Hippo.
* Boost Your Savings: Maximize your retirement with a generous 401K Plan and company matching up to 3.5%.
* Stand Out, Get Rewarded: Excel and be recognized through our KPI Bonus, Win of the Week, Spot Bonus, and Shoutouts Program.
* Flexibility at Your Fingertips: Work on your terms with flexible arrangements for most positions.
* Skyrocket Your Career: Unleash your potential with unlimited room for professional growth.
* Thrilling Events Await: Exciting virtual and in-person events that redefine fun.


The anticipated salary range for this position is $67,000-$89,400, plus annual & monthly KPI bonus potential.  

Salary is based on a wide range of factors that include relevant experience, knowledge, skills, other job-related qualifications, and geographical location.



#LI-Remote


\\*The safety of our candidates is our highest priority. When looking for a job, please be aware of cyber criminals, fake domains, and fraudulent job offers. Golden Hippo recruiters will **only** contact applicants from our official company e-mail domain, (NAME@GOLDENHIPPO.COM) or through our internal Applicant Tracking System, Greenhouse. In addition, Golden Hippo recruiters will **never** text you,send you checks, or ask you to disclose personal financial details. If you receive any suspicious communications regarding an open position or a job offer, please contact Golden Hippo directly at safety@goldenhippo.com to verify its validity.\\*



Click here to learn more about general internet safety and our hiring practices.



Click here to view our Privacy Notice to Job Applicants.

title: SEO Analyst
description:
**ABOUT SIMPLEVIEW:**


Simpleview is a software development, data analytics and digital marketing firm that supports destination marketing organizations to reach their tourism marketing goals with first-in-class digital products and services. We believe our customers - towns, cities, states and nations across the globe - have a role to play in creating great experiences for visitors, for the people who call them home and for businesses and workers who rely on travel to sustain their local economies.


We are looking to add to our professional, dedicated and hard working team an independent, talented, top-notch **SEO Analyst** with a great work ethic who thrives in organizations that constantly adapt and evolve.


Preference will be given to candidates in the Tucson and surrounding areas.

**JOB SUMMARY:**


The SEO Analyst is a customer-facing role that focuses on providing expertise and strategic consulting to Simpleview’s search engine optimization (SEO) clients. They focus on growing traffic and conversions through SEO and conversion rate optimization (CRO), but may also occasionally provide guidance in paid media and other digital marketing campaigns.


SEO Analysts support their clients by understanding their digital marketing objectives, conducting research and analysis, monitoring performance and providing recommendations to improve website traffic and meet client goals. The SEO Analyst accurately understands the client’s goals and objectives and effectively communicates that information to others within the organization.

**JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:**

**Account Management and Customer Service**

* Manages SEO and CRO services for all assigned accounts, to include meeting all service level agreements.
* Conducts phone and face-to-face consultation, reporting, and training with clients. Delivers presentations.
* Educates clients about SEO and CRO, including best practices. Provides recommendations for better results.
* Manages client communications and scope changes during project execution. Provides professional feedback and guidance when unreasonable demands are made.
* Reviews and responds to clients without delay and with complete answers.
* Assists customers with technical implementations.
* Creates and maintains positive client relationships and high level of client satisfaction.
* Identifies and communicates upsell and cross-sell opportunities.

**SEO Research and Analysis**

* Conducts thorough on-page optimization and site health checks.
* Analyzes data trends and organic performance, develops strategic SEO plans and conducts SEO activities to attain high visibility on search engines.
* Implements creative ways to improve organic results and works closely in a consultative role with the clients and SEO team.
* Explains SEO performance issues to clients in ways that are clear, understandable and valuable.

**Report Creation and Presentation**

* Utilizes Google Analytics, Search Console, SEMRush, and other platforms to review SEO performance and provide descriptive, predictive and prescriptive analyses.
* Provides complete and correct monthly and quarterly reports by the 10th business day of the following month. Ensures delivery of all reports at least 48 hours prior to client call.
* Conveys analysis and recommendations in the report that are useful and unique to the client.

**Ticket Completion**

* Properly executes and produces all contracted items within an SEO project’s stated scope of work.
* Thoroughly reads, understands and completes assigned tickets quickly without compromising quality.
* Creates and submits detailed tickets to SEO Specialists, developers or other departments for support when necessary.
* Reviews tickets when complete and checks for accuracy before closing the ticket.
* Self-manages ticket queue and assigns tickets as necessary for issues that arise, including new page optimizations.
* Develops and executes annual SEO Account Plan items on time and paces accounts appropriately.

**Conversion Rate Optimization**

* Ideates and executes data-driven A/B tests for client websites
* Utilizes Growthbook and Google Analytics for reporting
* Works with client to implement winning strategies across client’s website

**Technical SEO**

* Applies common SEO tools with confidence, including Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Google Keyword Planner, Google Search Console, SEMrush and Growthbook to assess SEO performance.

**Professional Knowledge**

* Displays up-to-date knowledge of SEO and digital marketing techniques, trends and developments.

**REQUIREMENTS FOR A SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE:**


This position requires a talented digital marketer who exhibits the following attributes:

* Demonstrates a strong background with Google Analytics and other digital SEO tools like Google Search Console, SEMRush, Mouseflow, Screaming Frog and MOZ, among others.
* Develops and executes search engine optimization initiatives to drive incremental search traffic.
* Exercises critical thinking to conduct thorough analysis that results in actionable insights.
* Is passionate about SEO and remains knowledgeable about trends and best practices.
* Communicates clearly, effectively and persuasively in both written and verbal forms.
* Exercises good judgment to take smart action and solve problems, does not require constant oversight, does more than the bare minimum and performs under pressure.
* Maintains high standards and provides work that is professionally composed and free of error.


A degree is not a requirement. The *ideal* candidate has a minimum of a year of industry-agnostic experience conducting search engine optimization in a client-facing role. Although actual travel is relatively minimal, the ideal candidate must be willing and able to travel domestically or internationally.

**HOW YOU’LL BE ASSESSED AT WORK:**

* Work Focus: working a minimum of 80% billable time to a client.
* Attendance: arriving or logging in to work on time and participating in meetings.
* Efficiency: meeting strict deadlines, project parameters and remaining within budget.
* Quality: consistently delivering work that exceeds client expectations and is error free.
* Attitude: maintaining a positive and professional disposition that motivates others.
* Growth: demonstrating an increase in: depth and breadth of knowledge, application of skill, the ability to deal with greater complexity and autonomy.
* Customer Service and Client Retention: providing support that fulfills customer needs, meets contractual requirements and which receives positive feedback and retains their business.
* Adherence to Simpleview’s Mission and Core Values.

**WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU:**

* Fulfilling work at a company that makes an impact in hundreds of communities across the globe.
* The ability to set a career trajectory and move along a growth path.
* Great co-workers, including geeks, parents, artists, gamers, veterans and average joes and janes.
* A friendly, diverse and casual environment.
* 100% paid medical benefits for employees and short-term disability paid by the company plus options for vision, dental, pet, long-term disability, and life.
* Relaxed dress code.
* 401K and options for matching contributions.

**CAREER PROGRESSION**


If successful, the SEO Analyst can continue to grow along the SEO Analyst career track, becoming next a Senior SEO Analyst and then Lead SEO Analyst. The SEO Analyst could also apply for open opportunities in other career tracks like digital media analyst, production education specialist or customer success manager, among many others, that would expand breadth of skill and knowledge.


Qualified candidates, please apply at: https://www.simpleviewinc.com/our-world/staff/join-our-team/


Or submit your resume at careers@simpleviewinc.com


Most positions are based at our Tucson, AZ, or Liverpool, UK headquarters offices. However, based on the job role, we will also review remote candidates. At this time, Simpleview can currently only employ remote staff who reside in the following U.S. states, Canadian Province, and United Kingdom: Arizona, British Columbia, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Florida, Georgia, Idaho, Illinois, Indiana, Kansas, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, Nevada, New Mexico, North Carolina, Oregon, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Virginia, Washington, and Wisconsin.


Qualified candidates, please apply by going online at: https://www.simpleviewinc.com/our-world/staff/join-our-team/.


Please submit your resumes using the **APPLY NOW** function below.


Simpleview provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

title: Technical SEO Specialist - Remote
description:
***\\*\\*This remote position is open to US residents only, excluding California, Nevada, and Alaska residents.\\*\\****

  

Page One Power was founded in Boise, Idaho over a decade ago and has grown from a start-up to an established SEO agency specializing in content creation and link building. Page One Power is a fully remote company.

  

 We are searching for an experienced technical SEO to round out our offerings to provide our clients with a full suite of SEO services. Our client portfolio ranges from enterprise-level to small local businesses in virtually every niche.

 **Role:** As a technical SEO specialist you will report directly to our Director of SEO Services while working closely with both the sales and client services teams. The right candidate will have deep experience in technical SEO and a proven history of working effectively in a highly autonomous role.

 **Core Responsibilities:**



* Perform full reviews of all existing clients, providing technical recommendations and implementing where needed.


* Completing onboarding documentation for all sales prospects, running initial site reviews and performance audits to identify existing technical issues and gaps, and providing clear analysis and documentation for the sales team. You can expect to join calls with prospects and clients as requested. Your primary goal is to grow the technical SEO product line by supporting new sales.


* Training our internal SEO Engineers in various technical SEO aspects to take over smaller tasks and projects and their expertise grows, freeing you up for the above-mentioned items and more in-depth projects.


* Developing and revising templates, client reporting, documentation, and implementation methods utilized in your role in line with Page One Power reporting standards.
  


**Expectations:**


* Perform full site review and analysis for client prospects, compiling recommended technical services.
* Investigate, research, and create reports for existing clients based on their technical SEO needs.
* Develop solutions to technical issues and action steps for clients.
* Provide actionable, impactful suggestions for clients and assist with implementing those suggestions through detailed documentation or in-person implementation.
* Implement technical solutions directly on client websites.
* Develop and refine technical products to meet client needs.
* Stay up to date on the SEO industry and Google algorithm updates.
* Communicate important onsite changes to clients effectively via phone or web conference.
* Find and diagnose issues websites are having within organic search.
* Independently identify both problems and solutions to client issues.
* Develop polished and professional reports.
* Communicate technical priorities verbally and in writing.
* Have deep existing experience in a technical role.
* Have experience working directly with clients via video call and in writing.
* Existing experience working autonomously.

  


**Technical Experience Expectations**


* Reviewing incoming prospects for technical opportunities/issues
* Implementing technical work on client websites
* GMB Location Optimization - Tailored to the number of locations for the client
* Local Optimization/Citation Set Ups
* Alignment with the keyword mapping that is provided
* Professional report and document creation including implementation guides
* Site speed optimization recommendations/execution plan
* Plug-in audits for new clients, or before recommending a new plugin for existing clients
* Toxic backlink audits and implementation plan including experience performing manual disavow outreach
* Domain Redirect Optimization
* .xml Sitemap Optimization
* Robots.txt Check
* Local Schema Implementation
* Organic Schema Implementation
* 404 Pages Reporting
* 301 Pages Reporting
* Google Analytics Filtering
* Internal Linking Audits
* Full Technical SEO Audits
* Migration Audits
* Traffic Loss Analysis
* On-Page HTML Recommendations

  


**Skills Needed:**


* Deep understanding of the different elements that affect a search engine’s ability to crawl, rank, and understand a website.
* Practical and advanced experience with tools such as Google Search Console, Screaming Frog SEO Spider, and various Analytics platforms.
* Ability to communicate effectively with clients via phone/email.
* Ability to create comprehensive, easily digestible reports for clients and their superiors.
* Effective time management.
* Independent access to all online tools and programs needed to complete technical work.

  


**Benefits*****:***


* Medical Insurance: Co-Pay or HSA (Company Contribution 75%)
* Vision Insurance
* Dental Insurance
* Supplemental Insurance Options
* Fitness Reimbursement up to $50 per month
* HSA with Company Match
* 401K with up to 2% Company Match
* Bereavement, Jury Duty, and Parental Leave Available
* 7 Paid Holidays a Year
* Flexible Work Schedule, including a 4-day work week M-TH

 ***\\*\\*This position is open to US residents only, excluding California, Nevada, and Alaska residents.\\*\\****

title: SEO Manager
description:
**SEO Manager**


The SEO Manager will be experienced in data-driven SEO strategies, possess a deep knowledge of all the functional areas of SEO, and excel at managing a team. The SEO manager has ownership of individual client accounts and will work with multiple SEO team members and internal departments to manage the SEO direction and performance. The SEO Manager will provide leadership and strategy for the direction of an organic campaign, including oversight of local SEO, technical SEO, and content. Additionally, they will be responsible for monitoring the performance and training/growth of SEO team members. They are pivotal in both helping individual team members grow and develop, as well as helping ensure the success of the client accounts they oversee.


Responsibilities
-----------------

### 
Strategic Development

#### 
Strategy & Execution

* Research and analysis of competitor sites as it pertains to their presence on the web.
* Build technical SEO audits, evaluate impact versus effort, and make recommendations related to SEO goals that impact the client’s campaign.
* Evaluate traffic and website data to identify technical issues with websites and provide solutions.
* Review and analyze websites, identifying areas for improvement and change, relative to a website's organic performance in the search engines.
* Develop strategies for on-site organic tactics and optimize following best practices such as: Schema, URL structure, taxonomy, title text, etc.
* Content strategies and planning that follow full-funnel, content clustering, or other approaches focused on driving results through the use of organic content.
* Develop strategies for off-site organic tactics: such as Local SEO and link-building strategies

#### 
Collaboration

* Provide SEO consulting and support to Account Managers and work with them in support of SEO-related efforts.
* Communicate with team on project development, timelines, and results.
* Work with and oversee freelancers/vendors where applicable.
* Work with Marketing Director and Director of Operations to determine the best tools to utilize to improve processes for SEO services, maintain tools, and provide training to team members.

#### 
Training

* Internal and external training related to strategy, i.e. industry best practices, and consulting as needed.
* When requested, educate and inform clients on best practices.
* Participate in the development and implementation of internal strategy policies, processes and standards
* Oversee and provide training to team members in SEO specialist roles as it pertains to SEO tasks, projects, and strategies.

#### 
Reporting

* Monitor and evaluate web analytics dashboards and reports in order to develop and recommend SEO strategies.
* Assist in the development and implementation of analytical and tracking solutions to enable multi-channel measurements; aligning them with determined KPIs.
* Analyze and resolve SEO-specific account problems and issues that create roadblocks to achieving SEO campaign goals.
* Continually analyze SEO strategies and optimize account activities to achieve business goals.
* Assemble strategic insights into presentation style materials for clients; present to clients when requested.

### 
Leadership and Team Nurturing

#### 
Alignment of Market My Market Goals

* Set clear goals that are achievable and roll up to the organizational goals, and keep the team on track to achieve them. This includes goals that: position the organization to be leaders in SEO by staying abreast of industry changes, identifying key insights from client successes, and ensuring that the SEO Team is able to apply these learnings.
* Work closely in the development of products and services and help drive the product roadmap alongside the SEO team.
* Work with the Marketing Director and Director of Operations to improve processes for accounts and outcomes for clients.

#### 
Facilitating Team Growth

* Acts as a mentor and resource for information related to the industry and the day-to-day work being performed.
* Encourage and foster knowledge sharing between team members.
* Cultivate growth opportunities and skills development by working with the team to determine the areas of potential knowledge gaps, focus points of innovation and learning
* Attend team meetings to discuss ideas, new tools, workflows, testing, and changes in the industry, how those changes will impact our clients, and how to best communicate those impacts with clients and other departments.
* Determine, plan, and run team training around specific disciplines.
* Ensure smooth operation and effective collaboration within their team and discipline.
* Listen to team members' feedback and find solutions to resolve or improve.

#### 
Facilitate Individual Growth

* Review and compile formalized performance feedback annually for each team member; work with them to maximize areas they show strengths in, and develop a plan to advance their skills in areas they need help in.
* Hold consistent regular check-ins with team members to go over individual goals and provide guidance and feedback on relevant projects.
* Act as a point of contact to assist with any issues, concerns, or general feedback.

**Our Core Values:**

* **Do What You Say**
* **Be Honest and Transparent**
* **Proactive, Not Reactive**
* **Be Thought-Leading**
* **Instill Trust Through Consistent Accountability**
* **Always Do Better, Always Be Better**
* **Do the Right Thing**


This is a salaried position with benefits such as PTO and Health Insurance available on first day of employment and 401k after 1 year. This position is fully remote. The budgeted salary range for this role is $70,000 - $85,000, commensurate with experience.


About Market My Market


Market My Market delivers completely customized, full service marketing campaigns that bring companies to life online. We pride ourselves in delivering results that directly impact business. Our ideal client is a small to medium sized medical office or law firm with a focus on personal injury, family, criminal defense and employment law.


We believe in growth, accountability, and ownership. The right person for this role will be on track for endless opportunities, and will enjoy the transparency of knowing their work is having an impact.


In 2021 and 2022, Market My Market was recognized as a Certified Great Place to Work.

***Note: Communication regarding positions will come from @marketmymarket.com or @applytojob.com only.***

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
**About Appriss Retail**


Appriss Retail provides real-time decisions and active risk monitoring to enable our customers to maximize profitability while managing risk. Our solutions are continually adapting to changing market conditions.


We bring 20+ years of retail data science expertise and experience. We serve a global base of leading commerce partners, representing 1/3 of all US omnichannel retail sales activity across 150,000 retail locations across specialty, apparel, department store, hard goods, big box, grocery, pharmacy, and hospitality businesses in 45 countries on six continents.


The company provides compelling, relevant, and profitable collective intelligence to operations, finance, marketing, and loss prevention. Appriss Retail’s performance-improvement solutions yield measurable results with significant return on investment.

**About the role**


The Digital Marketing Specialist is an integral member of Appriss Retail’s marketing team, helping to develop, execute, and maintain the company’s digital marketing campaigns. The ideal candidate will have a strong creative background, using Canva to create assets for email campaigns, ads, landing pages, and events. The Digital Marketing Specialist will be responsible for managing our email campaigns, including monthly digests, campaign emails, product-related emails, and event emails. The Specialist will also work closely with subject matter experts to create engaging blog content that is optimized for search engines and helps reinforce Appriss Retail’s position as an industry leader in retail fraud and abuse prevention.**What you'll do**

* Create and schedule posts in HubSpot for our social media channels that are engaging and offer a unique mix of topics and content, with the intent of increasing engagement, followers, and MQLs.
* Create and schedule emails in HubSpot for marketing campaigns, digests, product updates, and events.
* Work alongside our agency to publish two blogs a month, including topic research, building an outline with SMEs, SEO keyword research, finalizing the blog, photo selection, publishing it on our website, and creating social media posts and emails to promote them.
* Use strong creative skills to design images and videos for emails, landing pages, events, and organic and paid social media.
* Assist in writing content for the Appriss Retail blog, emails, and social media.
* Assist in editing the website in WordPress.
* Collaborate with other departments and stakeholders to ensure alignment and integration of digital marketing efforts with overall business objectives and brand identity.

**Qualifications**

* 1-3 years of experience building comprehensive digital marketing campaigns using a CMS or marketing automation platform (HubSpot preferred).
* Strong creative skills (Canva or Photoshop preferred) for creating branded social media posts, ad campaigns, and videos.
* Strong understanding of social media platforms, particularly LinkedIn.
* Strong content writing skills.
* Excellent writing and communication skills.
* Working knowledge of email, landing page, and website design best practices.
* Working knowledge of WordPress and Salesforce.
* Working knowledge of email marketing best practices and CAN-SPAM compliance.
* Must be able to work independently and within a team.
* Skilled in PowerPoint.
* Basic knowledge of HTML.
* Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in SEO.

**Physical Demands -**Sedentary **Benefits**  

Appriss Retail offers competitive benefits including medical, dental, and vision coverage. We offer an immediate vesting 401(k) plan with employer matching, unlimited paid time off for salaried employees, and well-being support including gym reimbursements, a subscription to Calm – Meditation and Sleep app, and paid leave for new parents and family care. As a hybrid global community, we also offer a remote work-first environment empowering our people to work wherever suits their lifestyle.
The pay range for this role is:
55,000 - 65,000 USD per year (Remote - United States)

title: Google Ads Specialist
description:
```Duties```  
- Conduct keyword research and analysis to optimize website content for search engines (SEO)  
- Develop and implement strategies for improving website performance, including conversion optimization  
- Manage and optimize performance marketing campaigns, including search engine marketing (SEM) and display advertising  
- Monitor and analyze website traffic and user behavior using analytics tools  
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on marketing goals and objectives  
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in digital marketing

```Qualifications```  
- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field  
- Proven experience in SEO, web analytics, and performance marketing  
- Strong understanding of conversion optimization principles and techniques  
- Proficient in budgeting and managing digital advertising campaigns  
- Familiarity with tools such as DoubleClick, Google Ads, and Google Tag Manager  
- Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions  
- Strong research skills to stay updated on industry trends and best practices

title: SEO Specialist
description:
**Join our award-winning A-Team!**



Ready to produce exceptional results with exceptional people? Get in touch, we would love to get to know you.



Affinitiv is the largest provider of end-to-end, data-driven marketing and software solutions exclusively focused on the automotive customer lifecycle. Backed by 20+ years of automotive and marketing expertise, we pride ourselves on being the go-to experts in the industry. Not only do we work with over 6,500 dealerships and every major manufacturer in the country, we're well-versed in OEM standards and the intricacies of a dealership or group's local business.



The **SEO Specialist** spearheads the SEO strategy for a designated set of clients within the department. This includes handling the day to day project management of SEO content as well as communicating with and reporting progress to their respective clients on a regular basis.


**Position Responsibilities:**


* Oversees and executes all SEO related aspects for their respective client accounts.
* Ability to open jobs utilizing our internal job submission portal.
* Oversees co-op/compliance approvals for SEO content.
* Quality checks SEO content before sending for client approval and finalizing.
* Interacts with clients, multiple departments, and team members.
* Makes creative changes at the direction of the client.
* Completes and plans 90-Day SEO Reviews and calls for each of their respective clients.
* Tracks the status of each client's job(s) in the Creative Department and verifies that jobs will be completed on time.
* Ability to use tools like Google Analytics, Google Search Console and our keyword tracking software to identify and interpret information for each account.
* Flexible to change and uses learned knowledge of the SEO industry to better the strategy behind their respective client accounts.


**Position Requirements:**


* Bachelor's degree in related field preferred.
* 1-3 years of related experience.
* Proficient with: Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point, Outlook and Office Suite
* Ability to manage a wide variety of tasks at one time
* Ability to communicate clearly both verbally and in writing
* Must be well-organized and detail-oriented
* Excellent people skills and the ability to work with a wide range of people
* Ability to maintain composure and function well under pressure
* Ability to meet tight deadlines


**Work from Here**

At Affinitiv, we have the best of both worlds. Our team members have embraced remote work and our Work from Here program allows for remote working and the utmost flexibility while keeping in person collaborating thriving in a safe work environment. Our Work from Here approach gives team members a choice to work on campus or remote, leaders can hold in person or virtual team meetings to collaborate and cultivate relationships.



Affinitiv knows you have interests outside of work, which is why we offer a comprehensive benefits package that includes medical, dental, vision and 401K effective day 1 just to name a few. We also offer generous PTO so you can enjoy off time with family and friends.


**At Affinitiv, we celebrate diversity, equality, and an inclusive environment.**



Affinitiv is committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are extended to all employees and applicants for employment. We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws.



All aspects of employment are decided on the basis of qualifications, competence, merit, and business needs. Affinitiv is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.

title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Specialist
description:
**About the Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Specialist position**

  

Design In DC is a digital agency built for the future. Over the past years, we have brought together an energetic and diverse team of experts who work in harmony to optimize every touch point of the user's website journey. It is clear that the future is digital which is why we are forward-thinking builders; design architects, and engineers that construct digital products and experiences for businesses and brands.


When you work with us, you get a global team driven by thinking, rethinking, and consumer insights as a means to change and disrupt. We bring together the best creative minds who use traditional methodologies to defy tradition. That is why we are a full-service agency with a unique and diverse arsenal of skills, from web design and development, to marketing and app development, to videography and animation. It is our mission to provide a solution to any question that you may ask. So let's build something for the future together.


Currently, we are actively searching for a highly skilled SEO Specialist to join our remote team. The ideal candidate should possess a substantial portfolio showcasing their expertise in the digital realm, acquired through freelance or agency positions.


**Key Responsibilities:**


* Conduct thorough keyword research, optimize website content, meta tags, and URLs.
* Perform website audits, collaborate with developers to resolve technical issues, monitor indexing, sitemaps, and crawl errors.
* Execute off-page SEO strategies, build high-quality backlinks through outreach and partnerships, monitor backlink profile.
* Utilize analytics tools to track website traffic, keyword rankings, and generate reports for optimization insights.


**Minimum Requirements:**


* At least 3 years of proven experience in both on-page and off-page SEO optimization.
* Strong understanding of SEO tools.
* Ability to analyze data and identify trends for optimization.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Strong focus on achieving measurable results and meeting deadlines.


**To apply, please submit the following:**


* A comprehensive CV highlighting relevant skills and experience.


**What We Offer:**


* Fully remote work arrangement: Experience the convenience and flexibility of a fully remote work setup.
* Flexible schedule: Tailor your work hours to suit your personal needs and obligations.
* Supportive work environment: Join a team that fosters collaboration and offers a supportive atmosphere for your professional journey.

  

  

At Design in DC, we are committed to providing equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants, irrespective of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, genetics, sexual orientation, gender identity, or gender expression. We ensure gender equality in compensation and benefits, ensuring that individuals of all genders receive fair and equal treatment for comparable positions, duties, and conditions.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
*AssetWatch serves global manufacturers by powering manufacturing uptime through the delivery of an unparalleled condition monitoring experience, with a passion to care about the assets our customers care for every day. We are a devoted and capable team that includes world-renowned engineers and distinguished business leaders united by a common goal – To build the future of predictive maintenance. As we enter the next phase of rapid growth, we are seeking people to help lead the journey.*



We are seeking a motivated and savvy Digital Marketing Specialist to join our marketing team and generate MQLs that convert to revenue, primarily through strong social and SEM paid campaigns. The ideal candidate will be passionate about driving digital strategy and enhancing our online ad presence to achieve our marketing goals.


**What You'll Do:**

* With a strong customer focus, intimately learn the customer personas and markets and think creatively about the best ways to get in front of and engage with our target market.
* Develop and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies and end-to-end campaigns to increase brand visibility and engagement across various digital platforms—including paid social media, email marketing, PPC and display ads, and other digital advertising tactics—all the way through the handoff to the BDR team to qualify or directly to demo. This includes developing retargeting and nurture campaigns to move leads through the funnel.
* Manage and optimize paid advertising campaigns on platforms such as Google AdWords, LinkedIn (and other social channels), ZoomInfo Marketing OS, and other relevant digital channels.
* Analyze digital marketing analytics reports and share insights with the team to develop optimization strategies.
* Collaborate with the content and creative to create high-quality content for various digital platforms and utilize existing content to adjust for different demand generation tactics.
* Develop lifecycle marketing nurtures and segmentation strategies.
* Leverage SEO keywords from webmaster to develop PPC strategies to drive web traffic and lead generation.
* Manage all paid social content, budget, and implementation.
* Coordinate with external agencies and vendors as needed to execute digital marketing campaigns.
* Stay up-to-date with digital marketing trends and potential new channels and strategies, including updates on social media marketing, attribution, and programmatic media


**Who You Are:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field or 3+ years of experience in B2B digital marketing, preferably within the industrial space.
* Experience with SEM, social media marketing, email marketing, and other digital marketing strategies.
* Proficiency in digital marketing tools and software, including Google Analytics, ZoomInfo Marketing OS, HubSpot, and LinkedIn.
* Excellent writing and story-telling skills.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
* Creative thinker with a results-driven approach to problem-solving.
* Leverage data analytics to determine which tactics are working and which are not, and to optimize performance based on results. Look for ways to continuously improve the team's performance.
* Scrappy mentality with ability to work in a very fast-paced environment.


**What We Offer:**



AssetWatch is a remote-first rapidly growing startup providing a game changing condition monitoring platform and mobile experience in the industrial manufacturing space.


* Competitive compensation package including share options.
* Flexible work schedule
* Full benefits and 401K
* Opportunity to make a real impact every day
* Opportunity to work with an exciting and growing team
* Unlimited PTO


We have a distributed team that works remotely across locations in the United States. We are open to candidates from most states but collaboration within core working hours is required.

title: Freelance Content Writer (SEO Specialist)
description:
**About Us:** Grown Brilliance is a dynamic and innovative online jewelry company that now has brick and mortar stores in the US. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality content to our audience while explaining the unique features of our lab grown diamond jewelry, and we're seeking a talented freelance content writer to join our team remotely. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to our growing online presence and make a significant impact on our digital strategy.

**Role Overview:** We are looking for an experienced freelance content writer with a strong understanding of SEO techniques to create compelling and optimized content for various pages on our website. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 5 years of experience in content writing, with a proven track record of producing engaging website content and blogs that drive organic traffic and enhance user experience.

**Responsibilities:**

* Collaborate with our team to develop content strategies that align with our business objectives and target audience.
* Write clear, concise, and engaging website pages and blog posts that are optimized for search engines.
* Conduct keyword research and integrate targeted keywords seamlessly into the content to improve search engine rankings.
* Optimize existing content to improve performance and relevance.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest SEO trends and best practices to ensure our content remains competitive.
* Meet deadlines and deliver high-quality content that meets our brand standards.

**Requirements:**

* Minimum of 5 years of experience in content writing, with a focus on SEO.
* Proven track record of producing high-quality website content and blog posts that drive organic traffic and engagement.
* Strong understanding of SEO principles and best practices.
* Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills.
* Ability to conduct thorough keyword research and incorporate keywords strategically into content.
* Detail-oriented with a commitment to meeting deadlines.
* Self-motivated with the ability to work independently and remotely.
* Experience with WordPress or other content management systems is a plus.

**How to Apply:** If you meet the above requirements and are excited about the opportunity to contribute to our team, please submit your resume, portfolio (including examples of website content and blogs), and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you're the perfect fit for this role to [contact email or link to application portal].

**Note:** This is a remote freelance position. Candidates from any location are welcome to apply. We look forward to hearing from you!

Job Type: Contract

Pay: $25.00 - $30.00 per hour

Expected hours: 40 per week

Schedule:

* Choose your own hours

Work Location: Remote

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
company: Quaint Oak Bank & Our Family of Companies
description:
**Quaint Oak Bank is hiring an experienced Digital Marketing Specialist.**  

Join a growing organization that offers excellent opportunities for career growth, a team atmosphere, and a competitive benefits package!
**Location:** Remote
