title: Remote SEO Expert
description:
***HireLatam is a premier recruitment agency that connects exceptional talent in Latin America with outstanding opportunities in the United States.*** ***With a proven track record and a commitment to excellence, we're your trusted partner in the pursuit of career success. Our extensive network, personalized approach, and supportive guidance ensure that you're in the best hands to find your next job opportunity.***

**Job Tittle: SEO Expert (Search Engine Optimization Expert 100%)**  

**Job Overview:**

This role is for an SEO expert who has hands-on experience with local and national SEO and can also manage resources and other people. You’ll be working on executing SEO programs with technical SEO, on-site SEO, overseeing link building and hiring/managing content writers/editors. At the same time, you make some tweaks to the content as well.  



  

You’ll also work with Google Business profiles and Schema markup implementation as well as more advanced strategies like Google Stacks and more.  



  

**Responsibilities:**

Some of the responsibilities include but not limit:


* Conduct Technical SEO.
* Keyword Research.
* Content Calendar Creation.
* On-site Optimization.
* WordPress management: Uploading content to the website, finding pictures, etc.
* Team management (team of link builders and with third-party agencies).
* Link Building management (we develop our own tools; you’d need to review websites to make sure we’re getting quality links).
* Anchor text strategy creation (for link building).
* CTR manipulation (we have the tools to do it; you need to learn and test how to do it).
* Reporting
* Creating and improving current SOPs.
Daily standups with the founder to learn, engage, and plan.  
* 

  

**Qualifications, Skills, and Key Competencies:**

* Experience with Google Analytics
* Previous experience working as an SEO specialist/expert for a US based business
* Fast learner
* Team Player
* Creativity knows no bounds – you're always thinking outside the box and love experimenting with new ideas.
* Positive attitude and a team player – we thrive on good vibes and supporting each other!
* Excellent English level both written and spoken
Must be located in Latin America  
* 

  

  

**Benefits:**

* Holidays in your country, Birthdays and special occasions.
Access to courses and learning directly with an industry expert.  
* 

  

  

**Salary:**  

**Two options:**

* $2,000/mo.
$1,500/mo and $100 per client you manage that stay more than 3 months. That means if a client you’re managing starts more than 3 months, on month 4, you’d be earning an extra $100/mo for each client you manage.  
* 

  

Examples:


Managing 10 clients after 3 months would be an extra $1,000 (total salary $2,500).


Managing 20 clients after would be an extra $2,000 (total salary $3,500).  



  

The idea is to start rolling out all the clients to you as soon as you get trained and used to our client's processes.  



  

  

**Schedule:**  

  



9 am - 5 pm PST with some flexibility  

* 
  

  

  

**Application Disclaimer: Please Read Before Proceeding**

*To ensure a fair evaluation process, please submit all required information on the application form. Kindly note that resumes and recordings must be in* ***English*** *;* ***any other language will lead to disqualification*** *. Also, ensure your* ***voice/video recording lasts at least 30 seconds*** *. Applications* ***without a voice/video recording will be disqualified.***

*If you apply for more than one position, we will only consider your application for the first job you applied for. However, if you do not qualify for the first position but meet the requirements for another, we can consider you for the relevant role. To streamline the process and ensure fair consideration,* ***we kindly request that you apply to a maximum of three jobs*** *and that you only apply to jobs that you truly qualify for based on the stated requirements and qualifications.*

*We value your interest and look forward to reviewing your application. Thank you.*

title: Search Services Specialist
description:
**Are you ready to be a big part of something big?**


At Trader Interactive, we make buying and selling a great experience. We’re a group of go-getters who decided they didn’t want to settle for the status quo. We come together as one team to build value and drive innovation across our industries - but we have fun while we do it and make sure our people are always our #1 priority.


When it comes to your career, we want to provide big opportunities to help you make a big impact. But for this to be possible, we strive to feel small. Small enough to quickly change tack, small enough to learn from different teams and small enough to connect authentically with leadership.


And one of the best parts? We give you the freedom to work from whatever working location works best for you and your lifestyle - yes, this means you can be 100% remote if you want to be!


**What We Offer**


* An inclusive and supportive work environment where you can move your career forward and will have the chance to do work that has real, significant impact on the world.
* The opportunity to be a part of a global group of digital marketplace businesses (CAR Group) located across Australia, Brazil, Chile and South Korea - collectively we have around 1,800 team members worldwide, and our Global Talent Exchange Program means you might just find yourself working in one of those businesses sometime soon.
* Plenty of flexible leave options and employee benefits including up to 31 days of paid time off in your first year, continuing education with access to LinkedIn Learning, a full benefits package including medical, dental & vision, 401K with company match, and wellness program.


**What You’ll Do:**

The **Search Services Specialist** is responsible for analyzing and implementing campaigns that will bring our dealers websites front and center for consumers to uncover quickly in their search.


* Provide insight and expert analysis on best search campaign practices for end consumers
* Manage performance of paid search campaigns on a daily basis, working within target budgets
* Work within the website platform to optimize each dealer’s website
* Serve as customer relations contact for end consumer and internal teams
* Gather industry research and trade intelligence to determine campaign needs for each client
* Prepare monthly reports for clients based on their portfolio performance
* Analyze and report keyword performance
* Make recommendations for any changes needed for the search campaigns
* Work cooperatively with all members of the business including sales and customer support
* Identify value added features to be added for the end consumer
* Participate in periodic account reviews


**What We’re Looking For:**


* Ability to analyze data, create spreadsheets, charts and graphs, and deliver marketing presentations in a professional manner
* Basic understanding of SEO/ SEM
* Experience in building SEM campaigns, including budget management
* Experience with on site and technical SEO
* Experience with Google Analytics, Google Ads and Bing Ads
* Experience with MS Office (Excel, Word and PowerPoint a must) and G Suite (docs, sheets, drive, etc)


**Bonus Points:**


* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing or related field
* 1 year of relevant work experience


So come and join our team - because every role is a big role in our plans to go big.


TI proudly supports a diverse workforce, and we encourage candidates from underrepresented groups to apply. Trader Interactive is an equal opportunity employer where hiring is based entirely on business needs, job requirements, and individual merit.

title: Creative Services specialist
description:
**About HMTX**
Headquartered in Norwalk, Connecticut, HMTX Industries is a global flooring company serving a diverse cross section of the construction and renovation marketplaces. The HMTX family of companies includes: Halstead, the leading supplier of resilient flooring to the Home Center market; Metroflor, its signature residential brand in North America; HMTX Commercial with the Teknoflor™, and Aspecta™, brands; and HMTX Global, which serves end users worldwide with diverse channel partners focused on Aspecta™ and Allure™, and OEM-private label brands.
As a global leader in sustainable practices, HMTX sets industry standards for quality and performance as well as superior product design. Its manufacturing processes, workplaces and product ingredients all reflect a significant dedication to sustainability, transparency, and societal impact. HMTX has received numerous accolades for innovation, supply chain performance, online excellence, and customer partnership.
HMTX Industries, a global leader in luxury flooring design and distribution, is seeking a highly motivated person with excellent interpersonal skills and operational expertise to join our team as a Creative Services Specialist
**Summary**
The Creative Services Specialist primary responsibility includes managing social media platforms which includes but is not limited to increasing post engagement, supporting SEO strategy, and driving traffic to HMTXCommercial.com. The position includes graphic design responsibilities as directed by the Strategic Director of Sales and Marketing to develop engaging graphics and content to promote the HMTX Commercial brands in both digital and analog spaces. The Creative Services Specialist must be able to work under tight deadlines while maintaining composure and professionalism. The Creative Services Specialist is also a steward of the Commercial and HMTX Industries brands, working to ensure that our brands and supporting sub-brands are maintained according to established brand guidelines.
**Key Responsibilities**
* Assist in product development and go-to-market strategy by creating various marketing materials including but not limited to sample labels, brochures, and folders.
* Provide production ready artwork to print vendors and factory and provide approval of proofs prior to printing.
* Develop various assets and content for social media posts, web campaigns and advertising.
* Develop and execute a social media strategy with input from the Strategic Director of Sales and Marketing
* Utilize content management systems to schedule posts, automate posting, and analyze effectiveness of social media strategy.
* Collaborate with HMTX communications personnel to develop a social media calendar that supports the social media objectives of HMTX Industries.
* Responsible for maintaining HMTXCommercial.com website and conducting website audits to ensure correct product assortments, brand updates, and collateral updates.
* Incorporate posting methodologies, supporting tower SEO strategy for HMTXCommercial.com.
	+ Analyze metrics to gage effectiveness of SEO strategy utilizing Google Analytics.
* Create layouts for sample devices, brochures, and other marketing collaterals
* Assist with planning and execution of HMTX Commercial events including tradeshows, client events and sales presentations.
* Assist various teams with updating technical documentation such as warranties, tech data sheets, installation guides, etc.

**Qualifications and Experience**
* Proficiency with Microsoft Word, EXCEL, PowerPoint. (Intermediate Level)
* Strong proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite applications: Photoshop (Intermediate Level), InDesign (Advanced Level), Illustrator (Advanced Level) and Adobe Acrobat.
* Strong proficiency in Squarespace
* Strong proficiency in Canva
* Typography Marketing. (Advanced Level)
* Understanding of SEO. (Intermediate Level)
* Understanding of working with brand channels.
* Understanding of web design across web, mobile, and app platforms, utilizing web design tools (i.e., SqaureSpace). (Intermediate Level)
* Working knowledge of Content Management Systems (i.e., Craft) to update HMTX Commercial websites. (Intermediate Level)
* Working knowledge of Premiere Pro and/or After Effects. (Intermediate Level).
* Bachelor’s or Graduate degree in Graphic Design, Digital Media or related field or 3-5 years relevant practical experience.


**Physical Demands & Work Environment:**
* Must be able to travel overnight as needed – 0 -10%.
* Must be able to work in an office setting with prolong periods of sitting/standing.
* Must be able to work in an industrial or warehouse setting, climbing, lifting, pushing, pulling, reaching, sitting, standing, or walking as needed.
* Work schedule is generally Monday – Friday, 8:30 am – 5:30 pm EST; with flexibility as agreed on with manager.

title: Technical SEO Specialist
description:
615 Ventures is a Nashville-based investment firm that creates value primarily through the acquisition and management of real estate nationwide. We currently own and manage 450,000 SF of retail, office, industrial, and residential space in 6 different US markets. Currently, we are focused on the acquisition of long-term, NNN commercial assets, but also have land for build-to-suit opportunities as well as a few commercial redevelopment projects in the pipeline. While we are focused in the greater Nashville area, we underwrite deals in nearly all 48 contiguous US states.

**The opportunity**



This is an exciting opportunity to design and launch a new publication from the ground up. As a Technical SEO Specialist, you will work directly with site leadership, coordinating on-page and off-page SEO strategies to help us grow our audience for a newly launched digital publication for commercial real estate developers. You will be a leading voice on SEO for the entire site, leading discussions around the content organization and theming, page structure, and site optimization strategies.

  


**What you'll do**


* Coordinate and execute on-page and off-page SEO strategies with teams, putting the reader first and aligning with SEO best practices.
* Work closely with editorial and business development teams to build topical authority.
* Collaborate with site leaders to understand patterns, trends, and takeaways that can improve the overall website.
* Contribute to the content calendar discussion and article ideation from the SEO perspective.
* Assist in the auditing of content and ideate around strategy for topical authority.
* Work with designers and developers to ensure website priorities and processes line up with business priorities and processes.
* Contribute SEO best practices to all relevant conversations, representing SEO needs and the importance of SEO for building topical authority.
* Closely monitor traffic and rank and be able to explain SEO performance to a wider group.
* Conduct competitor research and analysis.
* You provide technical SEO recommendations to improve the overall health of the website.
* Maintain knowledge of Google algorithm changes and SEO industry news, and communicate about these with the team.

  


**Who you are**


* Minimum two years of experience in a technical SEO role (agency or in-house).
* At least 1 year of experience handling SEO for a WordPress website.
* In-depth knowledge of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, SEO best practices, technical SEO, and other SEO disciplines.
* Comprehensive understanding of core SEO tools such as Google Search Console and Google Analytics, as well as popular SEO tools for WordPress such as Yoast.
* Strong understanding of web development languages, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and knowledge of server-side scripting languages (e.g. PHP and Python) and databases (e.g. MySQL).
* Demonstrated skills in conducting comprehensive SEO audits to check a website's technical health, indexation status, internal linking structure, and more. Able to identify technical issues and improvement opportunities.
* Competency in tracking and analyzing website performance metrics and KPIs, including organic traffic, page load times, and click-through rate.
* Knowledge of techniques to improve website loading times, including image optimization and caching. Proficiency in using tools like Google PageSpeed Insights
* Understanding of mobile-first indexing and optimizing websites for mobile responsiveness and page speed.
* Ability to design and optimize site structures for SEO via knowledge of XML sitemaps, robots.txt files, and canonical tags.
* Possess the skills to diagnose, prioritize, and resolve technical SEO issues quickly.
* Ability to explain technical SEO concepts to non-technical stakeholders
* Agile professional who excels in a fast-paced environment and thrives on continuously pivoting strategies to drive business needs forward

  

### 

**What we offer you**



Our benefits and programs are designed to improve your life for you and your family…


* Health, Vision, and Dental Insurance and beginning the first of the month after working with us for 30 days
* 401(k) retirement plan with 50% match (up to 6% of your annual contributions)
* 20 Days Paid Time Off (includes holidays, personal days, sick days, vacation days)
* Catered lunches 4 times per week in the office
* Weekly career development meetings for your first month


#LI-Remote

**Salary Range**  

TechnologyAdvice seeks to hire top-tier individuals across the world and intends for our compensation to be at a rate that allows us to recruit and retain individuals who align with our core values, purpose, mission, and vision.  

  

Final total compensation is based on a multitude of factors including, but not limited to, skill level, relevant experience to the position, and cost of labor.**Annual pay range**


$65,000—$85,000 USD**Work authorization**



Employer work visa sponsorship and support are not provided for this role. Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States at hire in an employer approved US state and must maintain authorization to work in the United States throughout their employment with our company.

  


**EOE statement**

title: SEO Blog Writer
description:
**About You**

* Do you enjoy working on SEO content strategies?
* Do you have experience with SEO blog writing?
* Do you thrive in a digital marketing environment?
* Are you an articulate top-notch writer who enjoys coming up with new ideas?
* If you answered YES! to all the above, GREAT! You’re exactly who we’re looking for!

**Role Overview:**


We are seeking a talented SEO Blog Writer to join our dynamic marketing team. The ideal candidate will be a skilled content creator with a strong focus on creating and optimizing blogs and web pages in alignment with our SEO strategies to enhance our online presence and improve positioning in search engine results.

**About the role**

* Craft compelling, SEO-optimized blog posts, case studies, service pages, and other content that ranks high in search results, increase organic traffic, and engages readers.
* Understand and implement best practices for on-page SEO, keyword integration, and readability.
* Update and refine existing SEO blogs and pages to ensure clarity, coherence, and adherence to SEO guidelines.
* Develop and execute SEO content plans and maps, guiding our website towards organic traffic dominance.
* Work closely with SEO specialists to select high-value keywords and decide on keywords with high buying intent.
* Demonstrate a solid understanding of the Ad Fraud industry concepts and effectively communicate them in written form.
* Understand the nuances of B2B communication and craft content that resonates with decision-makers.
* Leverage AI tools to expedite content creation and enhance output quality.
* Experience in crafting persuasive and conversion-focused copy is a plus.
* Build and execute content plans for the company website, ensuring alignment with overall business objectives.
* Experience working with WordPress CMS for content creation and publishing.

**What qualifies you for this role?**

* 3+ years of experience in SEO blog writing, and website content writing
* Proven experience in creating content strategies for websites.
* Familiarity with SEO content strategy and collaboration with SEO specialists.
* Strong understanding of keyword intent and the ability to prioritize transactional/buying intent keywords.
* Experience in writing about SaaS products, marketing, and B2B industries.
* Proficiency in utilizing AI tools for content creation.
* Familiarity with conversion copywriting is a plus.

**What’s in it for you?**

* Competitive salary
* Work that fits your personality and lifestyle
* Your hours are flexible, and so is your vacation.
* Any equipment/software/tech that you need to do your job.
* You can work from anywhere in the world - We work remotely!
* Once a year all expenses paid company get-togethers.

**How to Apply**


We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity in our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, or disability status.

**\\*\\*\\*\\*PLEASE NO RECRUITERS OR AGENCIES\\*\\*\\*\\***


  
ClickGUARD is an AdTech cybersecurity platform that is trusted by thousands of customers worldwide to protect and secure their digital marketing funnels, sites, and paid traffic source from bots and fake users.
We’ve built the absolute best solution for a significant problem affecting PPC advertisers globally, and we look forward to having you join us in taking it to the next level.


How we work
------------


We focus on talent rather than location to hire the very best for every role. Open communication is vital, and we use the best tools to collaborate efficiently. We are a remote-first company where everyone has the autonomy to create their best work.

title: Local Digital Advertising Specialist
description:
***Ready to be part of a dynamic and growing company?***
ServiceMaster Brands is looking for talented people to join our team! Come join SMB where we promote from within.

 **Local Digital Advertising Specialist**


We’re looking for an organized and articulate individual to join our team as a Local Digital Advertising Specialist under our ServiceMaster Clean Brand. In this role, you’ll have the opportunity to develop strong, meaningful relationships with our franchise owners providing expertise and knowledge on digital marketing. You’ll be a direct line of communication for our network when it comes to their local digital marketing and act as the liaison between our network and digital vendor


Timely communication is imperative in this position to ensure that projects, campaign optimizations, and other tasks are completed according to deadlines and communicated properly. A high level of dialogue is expected so that all campaigns run efficiently, meet deadlines, and satisfy the franchisee’s expectations.

 **What you'll do:**

* Hold vendors accountable for tasks and follow through to ensure campaign performance meets the needs of our franchisees.
* Communicate the correct information to franchisees, internal team members, and report to the Digital Marketing Manager.
* Work closely with Digital Marketing team to align and maximize local strategies.
* Understand fully each franchise’s needs, goals and expectations.
* Actively review and analyze campaign performance and make strategic recommendations to franchise owners on digital marketing.
* Actively participate in Strategy Calls, Performance Reviews, and other digital marketing related discussions within the network.
* Monitor franchisee dashboards on a daily basis.
* Maintain knowledge of franchisee performance and expectations on a consistent basis.
* Work closely with Business Development Representatives to monitor franchisee capacity and demand, especially during area wide events.
* Arrange meetings and set clear expectations with both the franchisee and digital vendor to understand their requirements.
* Maintain quality control of all work that is submitted by our digital vendors to ensure that expectations are being met.
* Oversee the communication and performance.
* Report campaign details to the franchisee and all team members.
* Monitor all stages of campaigns to guarantee that they run smoothly and effectively.
* Manage administration tasks that will help to keep campaigns well-coordinated and organized.

 **What you bring:**

* At least 2 years of marketing agency or digital marketing experience
* Excellent oral and written communication skills
* Ability to effectively communicate highly technical information to a less familiar audience
* Proven organizational skills
* Full awareness of creative processes and techniques, including digital platforms.
* True understanding of digital marketing, including an understanding of Google Ad Words
* A keen eye for detail and an understanding of the need to stay within the budget
* Must be a strategic thinker who is able to see the big picture
* Working knowledge of the digital space including but not limited to social media, search (PPC, LSA’s and SEO), display, and email platforms
* Willingness to learn new programs.

 **Work Location:**


This role is 100% remote with up to 15% travel required**.**

 **About ServiceMaster Clean**


ServiceMaster Clean is a provider of cleaning and restoration services in both the residential and commercial markets, operating through an extensive service network with more than 65 years of experience. The locally owned companies are backed by a national franchise network with more than 500 locations throughout the United States and serve more than 75,000 homes and businesses every day with a total commitment to customer satisfaction. Their vast network of experts provides a range of commercial cleaning services, including carpet cleaning, hard surface floor care, janitorial services, upholstery cleaning and tile and grout cleaning. ServiceMaster Clean is among the ServiceMaster family of brands. To learn more about ServiceMaster Clean, visit https://www.servicemasterclean.com/

 **About ServiceMaster Brands**


ServiceMaster® Brands® is a leading franchise provider of needs-based residential and commercial services in the restoration, cleaning, moving, and bioremediation industries. Founded in 1929, the company is home to over 3,200 franchisees across 4,600+ locations serving over 1,000,000 homes and businesses each year. ServiceMaster was founded with a deep commitment to integrity and customer service and does business under seven brands today across 50 states and nine countries that generate more than $3.5B in system-wide sales: ServiceMaster Restore®, ServiceMaster Clean®, Merry Maids®, TWO MEN AND A TRUCK®, Aftermath Services®, Indoor Science.


While each brand maintains a distinct identity, we share a commitment to our mission to **Making Everyday Heroes More Heroic**™. From our franchisee experience to career development to our community outreach efforts, our values – **We Serve, We Care, We Deliver, We Do** - guide us.


Working as part of our team means bringing your best ideas to work every day and seeing the impact of your contributions. Stars in our company at all levels are builders—they love to create, lead and see their plan come to life. Our best people understand that while great ideas are important, they require incredible focus and teamwork to execute. Life inside our company is the opportunity to do the best work of your career.


ServiceMaster Brands is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia.


Roark Capital Group acquired ServiceMaster Brands in October 2020. Roark focuses on investing in the consumer and business services sectors, with a specialization in multi-location and franchised businesses. Since inception, affiliates of Roark have invested in 100 multi-location, franchised brands, which collectively generate $62 billion in annual system revenues from 66,000 locations in 50 states and 89 countries. Please visit www.roarkcapital.com to learn more.

*It is the policy of ServiceMaster Brands, in accordance with all applicable laws, to recruit, hire, train, and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, national origin, genetic information, religious beliefs, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, pregnancy, disability, protected veteran status, or any other protected classifications, activities, or conditions as required by federal, state and local laws.*

title: Marketing Specialist
description:
Responsibilities include:

* Developing and implementing marketing plans
* conducting market research
* Brainstorming unique ideas with Leadership
* Develop detailed marketing plans with workflows, timetables, and all necessary execution details for the plan
* Managing all active marketing campaigns for assigned clients including:
* Diving deep to understand assigned client's business offerings, current marketing campaigns, and services
* Setting up, modifying, maintaining and managing paid advertising campaigns on Google/YouTube, Facebook/IG, TikTok, and other platforms
* Develop and implement SEO for clients. This includes setting up the strategy, researching keywords, buying backlinks, placing articles, posting articles, and using Yoast SEO / Rank math.
* Maintains research database by identifying and assembling marketing information internally and for competitors (swipe file).
* Developing strategies to achieve desired goals
* Manage all projects in progress through ClickUp and report weekly to leadership with status updates.
* Contributes to marketing effectiveness by identifying short-term and long-range issues that must be addressed.
* Provides information and commentary pertinent to deliberations, recommends options and courses of action, and implements directives.
* Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing professional publications, establishing personal networks, and participating in professional societies.
* Managing day-to-day communications with assigned clients, including:
* Sending reports (weekly and / or monthly)
* Sending updates on tasks related to reports
* Responding to slack channel messages internally and externally
* Coordinating with 3rd party service providers related to assigned clients
* Willingness to work on new or unfamiliar applications, tasks as needed to get get job done
* Supporting the Leadership with marketing activities by demonstrating expertise in various areas, including optimization, advertising, social media, direct marketing, and event planning.
* Assisting with the analyses of marketing data, including campaign results, conversion rates, and online traffic in order to improve future marketing strategies and campaigns.
* Performing other duties to support client success when needed.

Work Hours, Benefits, and Salary

* 3 Degrees Consulting operates 8am - 5pm Central Standard time. This role will be required to maintain the same schedule
* This position is 100% remote. Work from wherever you’d like (as long as you’re on during standard business hours)
* This position is 1099 W2.
* This position does include health insurance or 401k matching.
* Small startup culture
* Salary: $60,000+ with bonus opportunities annually

Expectations:

* Candidates will be required to have:
* Working laptop (Mac preferred but not required)
* Internet connection
* Web Camera for Zoom meetings (all of our meetings are on camera)

Qualifications:

* At least 6 years of experience in a marketing role for a company or agency
* Either:
* Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business, **or** a Related Field **OR**
* Quantifiable experience in a marketing role (be prepared to discuss specifics of what you did and the results you generated)
* Work for a startup or small business preferred
* Be highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform, and motivate
* Open to working on projects outside the dedicated roll. We’re a small team and occasionally you will b e asked to to work on unrelated projects. You must be willing to do whatever it takes to support our client's goals and the company's goals.
* Be very detail-oriented
* Open / Growth Mindset

Skills Required:

* Technical skills:
* Strong use of Google Suite (Docs, Sheets, etc…)
* Strong use of Microsoft Office (docs, sheets. etc…)
* Strong computer skills or ability to learn new software
* Slack
* Canva, Photoshop, or Illustrator
* ClickUp - Not required but will be using it heavily
* Go High Level CRM - Not required but will be using it heavily
* WordPress - Not required but will be using it moderately for blog posting & SEO
* Marketing Skills:
* Deep Understanding of the strategies, techniques, and methodology behind:
* SEO
* Paid Advertising
* Funnels
* Email marketing
* Copy writing (emails and web pages)
* Text marketing
* Websites
* Strong Understanding of:
* Google ads platform
* FB Ads Manager
* Google Analytics
* Google Tag Manage
* Social Media Marketing (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and LinedIn)
* Communications & Environment Skills
* Comfortable working in moderate levels of uncertainty and taking ownership of assigned projects
* Ability to communicate effectively with all levels of the company; be 100% responsible for the effectiveness of your peer-to-peer communications.
* Not afraid to ask questions when needed
* Not afraid to speak up when needed
* You will be required to bring well-formed ideas to the table to improve client results.

Extra Skills that are not required but would be good to have:

* ClickUp
* Slack
* SEO
* Freshdesk
* TikTok Ads Manager
* Hulu Ads Manager

3 Degrees consulting is heavily focused on living our Mission, Vision, and Values. We require that all team members know these and understand that they are an integral part of company culture and what we’re building. We have included them below. Be prepared to discuss them if you have an interview

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
**Digital Marketing Specialist**  

  

**Part time (10-20 hours per week)**  

  

**Colorado Based**### 
**Deliver Great Marketing to Great Clients**


Join a very different kind of marketing agency looking for our next exceptional team member. This position is remote, but is a Denver based position that requires occasional in person meetings.

**Who You Are:**


As a digital marketer who is an expert in SEO, paid search, and paid social advertising, you are great at making a big difference for clients. You help people and businesses reach their goals using digital marketing. You can figure out what you want to achieve and plan the steps and the time it takes to get there. You are always ready for what’s coming next and planning comes naturally to you. You are good at creating digital marketing campaign strategies that follow industry trends. Your skills in SEO, paid search, and paid social advertising help you create effective campaigns that keep up with the trends.

**Who We Are:**


We are a marketing firm dedicated to helping our clients reach their goals. We measure our success with their success. We are a distributed, remote team. We value frequent, honest, and transparent communication as a way to ensure we are delivering the best work for our clients. Our culture encourages personal growth, and we are committed to being better tomorrow. Everyday we strive to be better partners to our clients than we were the day before. We expect excellence, not perfection, and value collaboration to solve challenges.

**Job Requirements**

* 3+ years experience with Google Ads, LinkedIn Advertising, Facebook Advertising, Instagram Advertising.
* 3+ years experience managing SEO campaigns including onsite optimization, researching trends, and managing link building activities.
* 3+ years experience managing campaigns and measuring the campaign results in HubSpot
* Proven history of driving ROI with digital marketing initiatives including SEO, Paid Search, and Paid Social Advertising for both B2B & B2C audiences.

**Benefits**

**Flexible Schedule**


Work is completed from 8 to 6; however, you can schedule the hours. You are generally expected to be available during the workday and to check emails periodically. Outside of urgent/crisis issues, there is no required work on the weekend.

**Paid Time Off & Sick Leave**


We offer:

* paid-time off
* sick leave
* family medical leave through the State of Colorado.

 **Hourly - $30 to $45 depending on experience**

**FLSA Code: Non-Exempt position**

title: Sr. Specialist, SEO
description:
**Who We Are:**  

  

*At* ***Amsive****, we're more than just a performance marketing agency; we're a team that thrives on collaboration and innovation. We offer a supportive environment where personal growth is just as important as professional development. We're a team of passionate individuals ready to tackle challenges, learn from one another, and drive results. We believe in empowering our team members, providing them with the tools they need to succeed, and trusting them to lead the way. With decades of expertise and a commitment to integrated solutions, we don't meet the industry standard; we're setting it.*  

  

*If you're looking for a place where your work matters, a career path you can grow on your terms, and a team that's as invested in your success as you are, Amsive is for you. We offer a unique blend of flexibility, growth opportunities, and a culture that values each individual. Join us, and be part of the team ready to welcome, support, and grow with you.*  

  

***\\*\\*This is a REMOTE position. Candidates can be located anywhere in US Time Zones.***  

  

**\\*\\*We regret to inform you that currently, Amsive DOES NOT provide sponsorship opportunities.\\*\\***  

  

**What we are looking for:**  

We’re looking for a Sr. Specialist, SEO to join our award-winning SEO team. Our ideal candidate comes with 4+ years of demonstrated experience contributing to or leading organic search-driven website performance, preferably in an agency setting.  

  

**What you will be doing:**  

The Sr. Specialist, SEO will support Amsive organic search clients, particularly inlcuding but not limited to those in the B2B, SaaS, financial and health space. We’re looking for a curious problem solver to support our team in helping develop and execute search-driven content and technical strategies for our clients. This candidate will be responsible for handling a range of activities independently and in collaboration with a larger SEO strategy team.  

  

You should have a passion for the digital world, a propensity to problem-solve, phenomenal attention to detail, and a boundless desire to learn. Our most successful team members are often both "right-brained" (creative) and "left-brained" (analytical). They are also strong team players, as collaboration and education are very important within our SEO department.* Conduct comprehensive site audits and proactively identify on-page content and technical SEO opportunities
* Document recommended solutions, working with internal and client marketing and development teams to advise on implementation
* Perform competitive analyses to identify organic search opportunities
* Monitor and analyze client sites’ performance using a range of SEO and site analytics tools
* Interpret and explain data discoveries as they relate to organic search, specific SEO initiatives, and client KPIs
* Assist in developing and effectively communicating SEO strategies, roadmaps, POVs, and adhoc deliverables, and results to clients on calls
* Support the Sr. Strategist, SEO in preparing monthly reports and insights
* Identify opportunities to improve page speed, UI/UX and organic conversion rates
* Develop comprehensive keyword research documentation and strategic keyword evaluations to drive organic search opportunities
* Assist with QA of technical SEO implementation
* Stay up to date on current SEO industry trends and technologies, and communicate these trends to clients and the Amsive Digital team by occasionally leading internal SEO huddles and wider Monday Morning Company Huddles
* Consistent weekly time tracking


  

**Who you are:*** 4+ years of experience contributing to or managing successful SEO programs, preferably in an agency setting
* Understanding of current SEO best practices, search engine ranking factors, digital content marketing, technical SEO, intermediate marketing principles, and a strong grasp on how to help clients meet business goals
* Strong written and verbal communication skills, a positive attitude, and the ability to thrive in a collaborative and fast-paced environment
* Strong project management and organization skills, ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects on quick timelines
* Experience with Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Google Data Studio, and APIs for data analysis and reporting
* Proficiency with HTML and CSS; knowledge of JavaScript and/or Python a plus (curiosity and desire to improve in these areas is also a plus!)
* Experience using SEO tools such as Screaming Frog, Botify, Lumar, Ryte, SiteBulb, STAT, SEMRush, Ahrefs and/or Conductor Searchlight
* Strong Excel and Google Sheets proficiency


  

***Amsive*** *is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to building a supportive and inclusive environment for all employees. It is Amsive’s continuing policy to provide equal employment opportunity and not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, pregnancy or childbirth, marital status, national origin, ancestry or citizenship status, age, disability, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state or local laws. This policy applies to all aspects of employment, including (but not limited to) application for employment, recruiting, hiring, compensation, benefits, promotions and transfers, training, layoffs, rehires, termination of employment and all other terms and conditions of employment.*  

  

*As part of the Company's equal employment opportunity policy, Amsive will also take affirmative action as called for by applicable laws and Executive Orders to ensure that minority group individuals, females, disabled veterans, recently separated veterans, other protected veterans, Armed Forces service medal veterans, and qualified disabled persons are introduced into our workforce and considered for promotional opportunities.*

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
**Job Title:** Digital Marketing Specialist  

**Department:** Marketing  

**Reports to:** Managing Director  

**Location:** Pittsburgh, PA, USA or Remote  

  

**About Pair Networks:**  

Pair Networks is a renowned leader in the web hosting and domain services industry, boasting over two decades of expertise and innovation. Since our inception in 1996, we have been committed to delivering unparalleled hosting and domain solutions to individuals, businesses, and organizations worldwide. Our mission is to empower our clients to thrive online by providing reliable, scalable, and cutting-edge hosting and domain services.
**Job Summary:**  

Supports the digital marketing strategy by implementing programs and tactics to increase product demand, enhance sales, identify additional sales channels, attract traffic to the company website, and promote an online presence. Utilizes search engine optimization (SEO) analytics and search engine marketing (SEM) techniques to increase traffic to the website. Develops, curates, and deploys compelling content to attract, engage and retain visitors and promote sales. Prepares and launches social media, email, and mobile marketing campaigns. Collects and analyzes online statistics to identify marketplace trends and best practices to optimize online marketing performance.  

  

**Job Responsibilities:**
* Develop and execute digital marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, drive website traffic, and generate leads for web hosting services.
* Manage all aspects of online advertising campaigns, including Google Ads, social media ads, and display advertising, to optimize performance and achieve ROI goals.
* Create engaging content for various digital channels, including website, blog, social media, email newsletters, and online forums, to attract and engage target audiences.
* Monitor and analyze key performance metrics across digital channels using tools such as Google Analytics, SEMrush, and HubSpot to identify trends, insights, and areas for improvement.
* Implement SEO best practices to improve search engine rankings and organic visibility for relevant keywords related to web hosting services.
* Collaborate with the content team to develop SEO-friendly content, including blog posts, articles, videos, and infographics, to support digital marketing initiatives.
* Manage social media accounts, including Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Instagram, to foster community engagement, respond to inquiries, and promote web hosting products and features.
* Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify opportunities, trends, and emerging technologies in the web hosting industry, and provide recommendations for staying ahead of the competition.
* Coordinate with internal teams, including sales, product development, and customer support, to align digital marketing efforts with business objectives and ensure consistent messaging across all touchpoints.
* Stay informed about digital marketing trends, industry developments, and best practices, and actively seek out opportunities for professional growth and skill development in the field.


  

**Required Skills and Abilities:**
* Strong understanding of SEO, social media marketing, email marketing, and website analytics.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Data-driven approach with a focus on results and optimization.
* Passion for the web hosting industry and technology.


  

**Required Education and Experience:**
* Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field
* 1+ years of experience in digital marketing (preferred)


  

**Benefits:**
* Medical Coverage
* Employer Paid Dental and Vision Coverage
* Employer Paid Short-Term and Long-Term Disability Coverage
* Employer Paid and Voluntary Life Insurance
* 401(k) Saving Plan
* Paid Vacations and 14 Paid Holidays
* Opportunities for Flexible Work Arrangements
* Educational Opportunities


  

**Equal Employment Opportunity Policy:**  

The Company is an equal opportunity employer. Applicants for employment are, and will be, recruited, selected and hired, and employment decisions are and will be made, without discrimination on the bases of race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin or disability. This policy applies to new employees, promotions and all personnel actions within the organization.  

  

The Company prides itself on the contribution it makes to the community. It is the intent of the Company to comply with all federal, state and local laws relating to equal employment opportunity.

title: Paid Media Specialist
description:
HigherVisibility, a leading internet marketing firm located in Memphis, TN, is growing quickly and in need of a fully remote, experienced Paid Media Specialist.
  
  

If you offer the right experience, excellent analytical skills, and are able to take the ball and run with it, you will be highly valued and rewarded at HigherVisibility.
  
  

**Job Description:**  

The Paid Media Specialist will develop and manage small to large Paid Search accounts and marketing campaigns (Google AdWords, Bing Ads, Facebook Ads), working closely with account managers on a daily basis to make sure that our clients are receiving optimal results.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

* Maintain ongoing, proactive, and consistent communications with account managers and clients on account progress, performance and problem resolution
* Leverage PPC Management Platforms to maximize the efficiency and effectiveness of PPC accounts
* Actively test and analyze paid search ad copy to achieve maximum ROI
* Execute and analyze monthly paid search business metrics, budgets, and reports
* Research and evaluate paid search marketing efforts and identify new search opportunities
* Track paid search best practices, bid management systems, keyword developments, and industry trends
* Manage a large group of client PPC accounts


**Requirements:**  

* At least one year of experience managing PPC campaigns on Google AdWords, Bing AdCenter, and/or similar platforms
* At least one year of experience using Google Analytics and/or similar platforms
* Ability to demonstrate analytical skills, technical knowledge, and attention to detail
* Outgoing personality with great communications skills
* Advanced Web skills, proficiency with Excel and search engine interfaces
* Knowledge of conversion tracking and optimization is a plus
* Associates Degree, Bachelor’s Degree, or higher in Business or Marketing is a plus


**Benefits:**  

* Flexible PTO
* Employee-First Culture
* Fully Remote
* Work From Home Stipend
* Medical, Vision, and Dental
* 401K Matching
* Life Insurance
* Incredible Company Comradery
* And So Much More!


**About HigherVisibility:**  

HigherVisibility is a nationally recognized internet marketing agency that offers a full range of internet marketing services ranging from SEO, PPC Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Website Design, Affiliate Marketing Management, and much more. Our mission is to provide clients with the most professional and highest quality internet marketing services and customer service available.

title: Growth Specialist, SEO
description:
Tripadvisor provides a unique, global work environment that captures the speed, innovation and excitement of a startup, at a thriving, growing and well-established industry brand. At Tripadvisor, you will be part of a dynamic, fun and energetic team where you can immediately make meaningful contributions.



The Tripadvisor SEO team is seeking an enthusiastic, passionate Growth Specialist, SEO to own the project execution and analysis that helps drive a best-in-class search strategy across our business. This role will work directly on the core Tripadvisor product to impact ranks and increase user engagement. We take pride in our work and our collaborative, high-performing team. We love what we do, and we want you to love it as well!



As a Growth Specialist, you will be responsible for working with partners across the organization on every step of the product life cycle, from business requirements to post-launch analysis. Ideal candidates will have the ability to execute and drive measurable results, fluency with complex data, highly effective communication skills, and a passion for travel.


**A bit about us - we strive to be:**
-------------------------------------


* **Accountable**: We deliver what we say we will, when we say we will.
* **Transparent**: We build trust through constructive, open, honest and direct communication.
* **Growth Mindset**: We unlock our full potential when we are curious and learn from our success and failure alike.
* **Better Together**: We strengthen our ideas when we embrace diverse perspectives.
* **Adaptable**: We move faster when we embrace change and consider better ways to bigger outcomes.
* **Traveler Obsessed:** We win when our customers do, and it shows up in everything we do.


**What You'll Do:**
-------------------


* **Collaboration**: You'll partner with cross-functional teams as product/project manager to define product specifications, establish milestones, and assure quality.
* **End-to-end ownership**: Within weeks, you'll be writing specs, running tests, analyzing results, and making decisions that have real effects on revenue and profit for the company.
* **Experimentation**: We emphasize quantitative analysis and thorough, fast-paced experimentation and iteration. You will learn how to gather the preliminary data to build an experiment and how to subsequently analyze these results.
* **SEO:** You'll learn or hone your skills in how to optimize our site to improve our reach in Google, Bing, and other search engines. You'll track traffic patterns, research keywords users are searching for, and analyze data to determine how to make our pages rank higher.
* **Travel industry:** You'll get the opportunity to learn about all aspects of the travel industry (e.g., competitor analysis, top destinations by market, etc.). You'll then leverage your findings to optimize our site to reflect market demand.

**What We're Looking For:**
---------------------------


* + **Professional experience**: 3+ years of SEO or search marketing experience at a consumer-facing internet company.
	+ **Ecommerce experience:** demonstrated success in ecommerce,improving visibility across category and product detail pages.
	+ **Strong analytical & data skills**: You enjoy working with data (comfortable with Excel/Google Sheets) and are eager to get better. You must be comfortable writing and running your own SQL queries. Tableau experience is a plus.
	+ **Excellent communication & organizational skills:** You're a strong verbal and written communicator, a great partner to engineers and other teams, and able to execute projects and analysis independently.
	+ **Curiosity**: You're a creative problem solver with a deep curiosity about our business, Google algorithms, and how travelers search for information. Existing knowledge of SEO is a plus, but not a requirement.
	+ **Tech / web-savvy:** You're comfortable reading HTML/CSS, inspecting web pages, and maybe even writing a bit of Javascript.
	+ **Adaptability:** You thrive in a fast-paced environment and successfully handle ambiguity.
	+ **Striving to get better**: We expect you to be smart, hard-working, detail-oriented, organized, and motivated. You should constantly be looking for ways to improve on your skills and look for ways to add value to the team.
	+ **Academics**: Degree in economics, finance, business, statistics, engineering, or math preferred.
	+ Remote location available for US

The salary range for this role is $85,000 to $100,000. This is the lowest to highest salary we in good faith believe we would pay for this role at the time of this posting. We may ultimately pay more or less than the posted range. An employee's pay position within the wage range will be based on several factors including, but limited to, relevant education, qualifications, certifications, experience, skills, seniority, geographic location, performance, and business or organizational needs. This compensation range may also be modified in the future.



We strive to create an accessible and inclusive experience for all candidates. If you need a reasonable accommodation during the application or the recruiting process, please make sure to reach out to your individual recruiter or our team at greenhouse@tripadvisor.com.

title: SEO Client Onboarding Specialist (Project Manager)
description:
Are you looking for your next client-facing role? Do you excel at setting expectations and setting clients up for success? If so the SEO Client Onboarding Specialist role at BluShark Digital might just be perfect for you! Whether you are looking to stay on the cutting edge of digital marketing or have a passion for helping small businesses grow, BluShark Digital is looking for someone who is hungry for intellectual stimulation and out of the box thinking.  

  

BluShark prides itself on being an agency that puts its clients first as strategic partners. At BluShark Digital, we believe our core values of innovation, collaboration, and a focus on our greater community help us reach our goals and guide us in the right direction. We are dedicated to developing creative, practical, and successful Search Engine Optimization solutions for businesses, no matter their size or practice. Located in the heart of Washington, D.C., we work to help businesses stand out online and we bring more than just leads – we bring results.  

  

As a SEO Client Onboarding Specialist you will collaborate with our clients making their digital marketing strategy come to life. The Onboarding Specialist will be responsible for onboarding new clients, relaying action items to our implementation team, and setting expectations around client strategy. In addition to reporting KPIs to our strategic partners, the Onboarding Specialist will work with our clients and team members to help align our efforts with the business’ goals.  

  

While previous client success management experience in the digital marketing space is a plus, we also understand that people come across account relations from many walks of life, and we pride ourselves on tailoring our positions to fit the unique abilities of each team member.  

  

We have identified the following characteristics as important to succeed at our agency:* Organized and reliable
* Transparent
* Adaptable
* Empathetic
* Curious
* Alignment with our core values of trust, growth/innovation, collaboration, and community


Key Responsibilities of the Onboarding Specialist:* Conduct initial consultations with clients to understand their business goals, expectations, and key performance indicators.
* Guide clients throughout the onboarding and technical optimization process
* Provide guidance on best practices and strategies for optimizing SEO performance.
* Keep projects and timelines on track
* Alert management and client when requests are out of scope and coordinate the addition of services
* Attend to and resolve client concerns proactively


Our Hiring Process:* Selected candidates will participate in a 30-minute introductory call (an opportunity to make a great first impression)
* Top applicants will be invited for an interview with the hiring manager
* Finalists will be invited back for a shadow, offering insight into the position’s day to day responsibilities.


Benefits:* Compensation commensurate with experience with high opportunity for growth
* Work from home (Remote flexibility)
* 15 Days PTO
* Additional 2 Days PTO for Social Action / Volunteer Time
* Health Insurance (Medical, Vision, Dental)


Our process takes a great deal of time for us, and we ask you to dedicate yours as well. BluShark is devoted to recruiting talented team members who can grow in their positions and flourish within the firm by displaying a dedication to high performance, self-discipline, and motivation to gain more responsibility.  

  

BluShark Digital is committed to a work environment in which all individuals are treated with respect and dignity. Each individual has the right to work in a professional atmosphere that promotes equal employment opportunities and prohibits unlawful discriminatory practices, including harassment.  

  

BluShark Digital provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws.

title: (Technical) SEO Support Specialist
description:
This role is for the saas.group portfolio company: **Seobility**


**What is saas.group?**  

Think of us as the driving force behind your favorite software success stories. saas.group, established in 2017, is on a mission to turbocharge promising B2B SaaS ventures, unlocking their full potential. As a Software-as-a-Service portfolio powerhouse, we specialize in acquiring small software treasures and polishing them into industry stars. With a dynamic, fully remote team spanning 31 countries, we're rewriting the playbook on innovation and collaboration.


**And what’s the connection between saas.group and Seobility?**  

Seobility is one of the dynamic brands under the saas.group umbrella. Since joining saas.group in 2022, Seobility has been empowering the SEO scene with its all-in-one software, helping website owners and marketers worldwide boost their website rankings. Starting off in 2013 with a small but formidable team, Seobility now has over 500,000 users and has earned some international awards along the way!


**Do you want to know more about our culture?**  

Feel free to explore our Candidate's Hub to get an insider's view of saas.group, dive into our culture, and gain valuable insights into our team. We believe that well-informed candidates lead to stronger hires, and we encourage you to take a closer look at what makes us unique.


**Position overview**  

Join our support team of our SEO software, as a **Technical SEO Support Specialist**. In your new role, you help increase the success and satisfaction of our users, troubleshooting their everyday challenges which are often technical and complex. We are looking for somebody with a high level of positivity, professionalism and efficiency in their day-to-day work. Become part of our passionate support team, which is looking for a colleague with a hands-on attitude and the skills and experience to tackle customer issues efficiently in depth or quantity.


### **Your responsibilities**


* With your help, Seobility customers will be even more successful and satisfied: you respond to inquiries and always find the right solution to their needs.
* With your technical and SEO background, you are able to troubleshoot the often technical or complex issues our users have with our SEO platform.
* For regularly occurring queries, you determine the cause, suggest possible solutions and, in some cases, even implement them independently.
* You learn the ins and outs of our SEO software and understand potential use cases for each tool on the platform, addressing our users needs and questions.
* You handle communication in an efficient, professional and value-oriented manner, fostering a high level of customer satisfaction.

### **How will you add value**


* You have (technical) SEO experience and basic web development knowledge.
* As a team player and communication talent, you not only enjoy working with our users, but also impress with your positive and open manner.
* Your analytical mindset and eye for detail helps you at understanding complex problems and finding adequate solutions.
* You have the ability to independently identify optimization potentials.
* You communicate in both English and German at a high, professional level, both verbally and in writing. Bonus points for Spanish.
* You are well organized, you know how to prioritize tasks, and you get things done.
* You are willing to work in a remote-first setup, or in our office in Nuremberg.

### **We care about your well-being and professional success, so we offer you**


* **Flexibility:** We’re 100% remote. You can work from wherever you like, whenever you like (European Timezone preferred).
* **Freedom and autonomy:** We’re a high-trust team, and you’ll be given lots of independence to solve problems in your own way — with plenty of help from the team when you need it.
* **Minimum bureaucracy:** We don’t like to get bogged down with meetings and red tape. We like to be efficient and keep momentum steady & sustainable.
* **Small & friendly team:** We help each other out, have fun, and joke around.
* **Unlimited paid time off:** We want you to recharge your batteries when needed


Sounds like something you’re up for? Feel free to apply even if you don’t check all these boxes.
  

We believe in the power of diversity and fresh perspectives to spice up our team.
  

Your application might just be the missing ingredient!


—


*SaaS.Group is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. If you're passionate about working with a team that values innovation, excellence, and fairness, we encourage you to apply.*

title: Demand Generation Specialist
description:
**Job Title:** Demand Generation Specialist – Ad Strategy, Creative, and Copy

**Classification:** Full-Time, Non-Exempt, At-Will

**Reports to:** Demand Generation Manager

**Department:** Sales and Marketing

**Location:** Remote:Travel required up to 10% of the time.

 **Location Status:** Work will be primarily performed remotely from home office. Employee will be required to utilize personal phone and internet services to perform telecommuting with reimbursement according to applicable procedures. Occasional travel to and work from other Race offices or off-site locations may be required.

 **Race Communications is only accepting remote candidates who reside in the following states: California, Colorado, Arizona, Oregon, Hawaii, Florida and Oklahoma. If you do not reside in one of these states, you are not eligible for remote employment.**

 **About Us:**


Race Communications is one of California’s leading telecommunications and fiber technology companies, offering a full range of communications services and competing in over 25 markets with investments totaling **$150M** in recent years.


Working in partnership with several public and private entities, Race focuses its efforts on building top-tier networks that service small businesses and Fortune 500 companies alike.


Our comprehensive network has brought significant improvements to local entities, education, community services, and public safety across the state.


In today's connected world, reliable, high-speed internet is an absolute necessity, and it is our company's **mission** to provide advanced communications at an affordable price. Race focuses its efforts towards building world-class fiber networks and offering gigabit internet service to communities throughout California.

 **Summary:**


The Demand Generation Specialist will make a significant impact in driving successful marketing campaigns. The Demand Generation Specialist has expertise in ad strategy, creative development, and copywriting. This role requires a marketer proficient in utilizing digital tools and platforms to effectively engage target audiences, optimize campaigns, and generate high-quality leads through traditional and digital advertising efforts. The Demand Generation Specialist should demonstrate a unique combination of strategic thinking, analytical skills, and creative flair to design and implement compelling ad strategies and content.

 **Qualifications and Experience:**

  

* Eligibility for US Employment without sponsorship
* Minimum of 18 years of age
* Bachelor’s degree (B.A./B.S.) or equivalent education in a related field of study is preferred
* A valid driver's license subject to successful verification through a DMV check, is mandatory
* Proficiency in Spanish Language a plus
* The ability to effectively communicate in English, including speaking, reading, writing, and comprehension, as necessary for effective job performance and workplace communication
* 3-6 years of marketing experience, preferably in B2C environments, emphasizing digital marketing programs
* Experience leveraging social media platforms for successful lead generation
* Proficiency in SEO and PPC tools (e.g., SEMRUSH, Google, LinkedIn, Facebook)
* Familiarity with website analytics tools and the ability to track goals, report website metrics, and align them with marketing strategies
* Understanding of lead generation metrics (e.g., CTR, impressions, conversions) associated with digital marketing campaigns
* Demonstrated success in executing and reporting on digital marketing initiatives
* Telecom experience preferred
* Certifications in HubSpot, Google Analytics preferred

 **Skills:**

  

* Enthusiasm for continuous learning and skill development
* Proficient use of MS Office applications including Teams, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint; teleconferencing applications
* Functional use of common office equipment, computers, and office software
* Strong time management skills, with the ability to manage priorities and workflow
* Commitment to accuracy and high standards for quality of work
* Ability to work with all levels of team members and management
* Excellent problem resolution and customer service skills
* Ability to deal effectively with a diversity of individuals at all organizational levels
* Strong organizational skills that reflect ability to perform and prioritize multiple tasks seamlessly with excellent attention to detail
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Ability to work on complex projects with general direction and minimal guidance
* Versatility, flexibility, and willingness to work within constantly changing priorities with a sense of urgency
* Good judgement with the ability to make timely and sound decisions
* Highly resourceful team-player, with the ability to also be extremely effective independently
* Ability to effectively present information and respond to questions

 **Essential Duties and Responsibilities:**

  

Marketing Program Design and Execution:

* Designs and executes marketing programs targeting and engaging specific markets

Marketing Automation and Lead Generation:

* Utilizes marketing automation platforms (e.g., HubSpot) to track and optimize lead generation and nurturing programs via email campaigns, content marketing, paid media, and social channels

 Ad Creation and Collaboration:

* Manages ad creation process through collaboration with our content team to produce creative visuals and copy for print, radio, and digital advertisements

 PPC and Social Media Ad Campaigns:

* Create PPC and social media ad campaigns strategy to generate high-quality leads and drive website clicks, continuously optimizing campaign performance, reducing CPC, and enhancing conversions

 Performance Tracking and Analysis:

* Tracks, reports, and analyzes program performance metrics, making data-driven recommendations for further enhancements with our Demand Generation team

 Project Management:

* Efficiently manages project timelines and deliverables that are assigned

 Social Media and Lead Generation:

* Leverages social media platforms for successful lead generation

 Other duties as necessary may include but are not limited to:

* Successfully completes assigned training and examinations, as well as participate in ongoing performance and development reviews, and goal setting
* Be available to participate in internal or external meetings, special functions, and professional development opportunities
* Cross-trains and shares knowledge with other team members
* Supports routine tasks
* Maintains a professional appearance, hygiene, and demeanor
* Performs other related duties as assigned by management

**As Part of Our Team, You'll Enjoy:**

* 100% premium paid for medical, dental, vision and life for all our employees!
* An excellent 401 (k) with 100% Employer-matched up to 4%
* Working to bridge the digital divide between rural and urban areas, providing much needed services to those who don't have access to reliable internet
* Working for a company that appreciates their employees; every member of the Race team is a part of a collaborative family

  

All offers of employment are contingent until all pre-employment requirements are met. These requirements, which vary by position, may include drug and background screenings as well as Motor Vehicle and DOT related screening and reporting requirements. Race will consider qualified job applicants with arrest and conviction records for employment.

  

All new employees will participate in the mandatory 'Speedway to Success' (Speedway) orientation at one our offices located in either Tehachapi, CA, Yuba City, CA, or South San Francisco, CA. The duration of the Speedway program spans from 1-3 weeks, depending on the position. During Speedway the schedule will vary: 8-hour days are planned, but shorter days may occur depending on the group’s pace. Applicants further than 50 miles from these training locations will be provided with necessary travel accommodations as part of the onboarding process. Applicants 50 miles or less from these locations will be considered regular commute. For those working remotely, virtual attendance will depend on position requirements. Further details will be provided to you during the interview process, and before your start date.

  

Race Communications is an equal opportunity employer who welcomes applications from individuals (with or without reasonable accommodation), with the skills, experience, and dedication to excel in their roles without regard to race, religion, color, sex/gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding, or related medical conditions), sex stereotype, gender identity/gender expression and sexual orientation, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information/characteristics, marital status/registered domestic partner status, age, sexual orientation, reproductive health decision-making, military or veteran status or any other basis protected by federal, state, or local law, ordinance, or regulation.

  

Reasonable accommodation(s) for qualified individuals with disabilities are available as part of the application and interview processes. If accommodations are needed during the application or interview process, or workplace accommodations are required after a job offer is made, please contact hr@race.com to initiate the interactive process.
