title: SEO Executive
description:
**Job Summary**

We are looking for a tech-savvy individual who is interested in working as an SEO Executive for our company.

As an SEO Executive, you will be responsible for developing and implementing SEO strategies to improve website traffic. You will also be responsible for researching keywords and staying on top of the Search Engine Results page.

To be successful in this job position, you should analyze the website’s performance and find out ways to improve them efficiently. You will also be coordinating with the content team to write content that is attractive and engaging.

Apart from this, you should possess strong explaining skills and the ability to stay updated with Google algorithm changes. You should have excellent communication skills and extraordinary analysis skills.

If you think you can take up this challenging job role of an SEO executive, then write to us now. We look forward to working with you.

**Responsibilities**

* Implementing and developing SEO strategies.
* Researching the competitors, both on-site and off-site.
* Performing keyword research for content.
* Writing engaging SEO content along with the Content.
* Optimizing content regularly on the website.
* Maintaining the website on a regular basis.
* Developing and implementing link building strategies.
* Collaborating with the Digital Marketing team.
* Analyzing the website using the analytical tool.
* Improving website performance.
* Proposing changes in the website content.
* Measuring the ROI and success of the website.
* Staying up to date with the latest Google Algorithm changes.

**Requirements**

* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communication, Information Technology, or a related field.
* Work experience as an SEO Executive, SEO Specialist, or a similar position.
* Professional certification of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is mandatory.
* Excellent understanding and experience with website analytics tools like Moz, Google Analytics, etc.
* Sound understanding of conversion and performance marketing.
* Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS.
* Good verbal and written communication skills.
* A keen eye for details.
* Ability to work independently or in a team environment as and when required.
* Demonstrate excellent keyword research techniques.
* Excellent time management skills.
* Strong decision making and reasoning skills.
* Excellent organizational and interpersonal skills.
* Strong work ethic

Keyword Research, On-Page SEO, Off-Page SEO, Technical SEO, Content Optimization, Competitor Analysis, Local SEO, Link Building, GA4

**Company Overview:**  

Sundew, a trailblazer in digital transformation, boasts a 16-year legacy of excellence. Our core competencies lie in digital strategy, application development, and product engineering.


As we expand, we seek dynamic and seasoned Lead Digital Marketing professionals to steer our Digital Strategy and Marketing projects. The ideal candidate will possess hands-on experience with USA-based customers, demonstrating a track record of delivering meaningful ROI and Strategy Planning achievements.


Given our focus on the US insurance industry, a strong understanding of US insurance perspectives is an added advantage.


**Responsibilities:**


* Perform keyword research for organic search optimization, keeping abreast of trends and algorithms.
* Optimize website content and structure, ensuring proper use of meta tags and schema markup.
* Implement effective link-building strategies and stay updated on best practices. Audit websites for technical SEO issues and make necessary improvements.
* Monitor competitor SEO strategies, analyze performance, and develop strategies to outrank competitors.
* Use tools like Google Analytics for tracking and reporting on website performance.
* Optimize local and mobile SEO, manage Google Business Profile, and stay updated on voice search best practices.
* Conduct comprehensive SEO audits, identifying issues and providing improvement recommendations.
* Manage global SEO campaigns and geotargeting for international audiences.


**Key Requirements:**


* 4+ Years of experience in the IT Services Industry.
* Proven experience as an SEO Specialist or similar role.
* Require experience in diverse international markets across various domains.
* In-depth knowledge of SEO techniques, algorithms, and tools.
* Proficiency in SEO software, analytics tools, and keyword research tools.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices.
* **Certifications in SEO** (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Ads, Moz) **are a must.**


**How to Apply:**  

Interested candidates should submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and explaining how they meet the specified requirements. Include examples of successful projects managed regarding hiring and critical decisions made in the process.


**Sundew is an equal opportunity employer.**  

**We encourage candidates of all backgrounds to apply.**

title: SEO Specialist
description:
**Job Title: SEO Specialist**

**Job Type: Full Time/Permanent**

**Job Location: Andheri, Mumbai**

**Company Location : Dubai**

**Industry Type: Business setup-Dubai**

**Job Overview:**

As a SEO Analyst focusing on business setup services in Dubai, you will be responsible for optimizing our online presence to attract and engage clients interested in business establishment in the UAE. This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams while working from India to implement effective SEO strategies.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Keyword Research and Localization:**

Conduct keyword research specific to Dubai's business setup industry and local market trends.

Optimize content for location-based keywords to target the Dubai business community.

**On-Page Optimization for Business Services:**

Optimize website content, meta titles, and meta descriptions to align with business setup services.

Ensure that on-page elements reflect the unique aspects of business establishment in Dubai.

**Local SEO and Google My Business:**

Optimize and maintain the Google My Business profile for enhanced local visibility.

Implement local SEO strategies to target entrepreneurs and businesses interested in establishing a presence in Dubai.

**Technical SEO for International Audience:**

Conduct technical SEO audits to address issues that might impact international search engine visibility.

Optimize site structure, speed, and user experience for a global audience.

**Content Strategy for Legal and Regulatory Landscape:**

Collaborate with content creators to develop content highlighting the legal and regulatory aspects of business setup in Dubai.

Implement content optimizations to address client queries regarding the business setup process.

**Link Building and Partnerships:**

Develop and execute link-building strategies with a focus on partnerships within the business setup ecosystem.

Identify and pursue opportunities for high-quality backlinks from industry-relevant sources.

**Analytics and Reporting:**

Monitor and analyze website performance using SEO tools and analytics platforms.

Generate regular reports on key SEO metrics, providing insights into the effectiveness of the strategy.

**Cultural Sensitivity and Communication:**

Demonstrate cultural sensitivity and understanding of the business landscape in Dubai.

Effectively communicate SEO strategies and updates to the remote team in India and other stakeholders.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, IT, Communications, Business, or a related field.
* 5-7 years proven experience as an SEO Analyst
* In-depth knowledge of SEO best practices, search engine algorithms, and localization strategies.
* Familiarity with SEO tools such as Google Analytics, SEMrush, Moz, etc.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to cultural nuances.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a remote setting.

If interested please drop an email with resume and cover letter to hr@yabsuae.com or whatsapp to +97156 520 3540.

* SEO: 5 years (Required)

* Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

title: SEO Executive
description:
Full time SEO specialist who knows how to unlock organic growth.

We are looking for a passionate SEO Specialist to join our team and support with day to day SEO operations for our Clients.

**Key Responsibilities (but not limited to)**

* Support SEO Manager and Brand Teams in the execution of SEO strategy for the UK region
* Provide operational expertise and technical SEO guidance to the Clients to ensure the websites are fully optimized.
* Work with SEO Manager to ensure that all online development projects maximize organic search value.
* Carry out regular site audits and analysis across several Client websites to ensure they’re set up in line with SEO best practice and being continually optimized. Provide recommendations based on keyword research, authority, competition and highlight improvement opportunities.
* Regularly review sites to identify broken links, legacy pages and redirect chains.
* Manage and produce regular reporting on keyword performance, ranking and organic traffic for selected brands and share recommendations on how to enhance organic search visibility and performance. Report on impact of implemented changes.
* Contribute to the creation, maintenance and implementation of SEO best practice guidelines and keyword glossary.
* Ensure SEO best practice is considered from URL structure, product and navigation set up through to content creation and launches of new campaigns.
* Provide keyword glossary and guidance to digital copywriters to ensure on-site copy is fully optimized for SEO.
* Ensure we are up to date with industry trends, competitor activity, innovations and opportunities within the SEO space.
* Build relationships with key internal teams across brands, marketing, production and content to ensure SEO strategy is aligned.

**Qualifications:**

* Experience with Google and Bing’s services, including Analytics and Webmaster Tools
* Experience with Google’s Keyword Tool
* Experience with SEMrush
* A functional understanding of HTML and CSS
* The ability to work with back-end SEO elements such as, but not limited to .htaccess, robots.txt, metadata, site speed optimization, and related skills
* Proven success in link building and content strategies
* The ability to deploy an effective local and long-tail Keyword research strategy
* A deep understanding of mobile strategy and how it relates to SEO
* A solid grasp of how blogging, press releases, social media, and related strategies go hand-in-hand with SEO
* Experience in building inbound organic search traffic and improving SERPs
* A background in creating reports showing web analytics data and site evaluations
* An up-to-date, working knowledge of current, past, and projected trends in the SEO industry
* Familiarity with the best tools in the trade
* Someone hands on who also loves to dig into the detail and share bigger picture ideas

title: SEO Executive
description:
Hey there, SEO enthusiasts!

I'm on the hunt for a talented SEO Specialist to join our dynamic team here at DJs Outsourcing Private Limited. As this role is brand new, you'll have the incredible opportunity to **build the SEO foundation from the ground up** and make a real impact on our online presence.

In this role, you'll be working alongside me, collaborating closely to develop and implement winning SEO strategies that drive organic traffic and boost our search engine rankings.

**Here's a glimpse into what your days might look like:**

* **Keyword Research & Analysis:** You'll be the keyword king/queen, uncovering high-volume, relevant keywords that will attract your ideal audience.
* **On-Page Optimization:** Get ready to dive into website optimization! You'll be making sure our content is search engine friendly, with a focus on title tags, meta descriptions, and internal linking.
* **Content Marketing Powerhouse:** We believe content is king (or queen!), so you'll work closely with our content creators to ensure our content is optimized for search and resonates with our target audience.
* **Link Building Champion:** Building high-quality backlinks is crucial for SEO success. You'll develop and implement creative link-building strategies to boost our website authority.
* **SEO Analytics & Reporting:** Data is our friend! You'll be tracking key SEO metrics, analyzing results, and presenting insights to the team so we can continuously improve our strategies.
* **Staying Ahead of the Curve:** The SEO landscape is ever-changing. You'll be responsible for staying up-to-date on the latest SEO trends and best practices.

**To thrive in this role, you'll ideally possess:**

* 1-2 years of experience in SEO, with a proven track record of success.
* Strong understanding of SEO principles and best practices, including on-page optimization, link building, and technical SEO.
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret SEO data and make data-driven recommendations.
* Proficiency in SEO tools and platforms, such as Google Search Console, Ahrefs, and SEMrush.
* A passion for content creation and the ability to translate SEO strategies into clear, actionable steps for content creators.
* Stellar communication and collaboration skills – you'll be working closely with me and other team members.
* A self-starter with a strong work ethic and the ability to manage multiple tasks effectively.

**What We Offer:**

* The chance to **build an SEO strategy from scratch** and leave your mark on our online success.
* A collaborative and supportive work environment where you'll be valued and heard.
* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunity for professional development and growth.

**Ready to join me on this exciting SEO adventure? Apply now.**

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: ₹8,000.00 - ₹25,000.00 per month

* Paid sick time
* Paid time off

* Monday to Friday

Supplemental pay types:

* Performance bonus

* total work: 1 year (Preferred)

title: SEO Specialist
description:
**ABOUT** **NEWTON SCHOOL**


Come be part of a rocketship that’s creating a massive impact in the world of education!


On one side you have over a million college graduates every year with barely 5% employability rates and on the other side, there are thousands of companies struggling to find talent. Newton School aims to bridge this massive gap through it’s personalised learning platform. We are building an online university and solving the deep problem of employability of graduates.


Wehave a strong core team consisting of alumni from IIT's and IIM’s, having several years of industry experience in companies like Unacademy, Inmobi, Ola, Microsoft - among others. On this mission, we are backed by some of the most respected investors around the world, - RTP Global, Nexus Venture Partners and a slew of angel investors including CRED’s Kunal Shah, Flipkart’s Kalyan Krishnamoorthy, Unacademy and Razorpay founders, Udaan’s Sujeet Kumar among others.  

  

**Job Brief:**  

As an SEO Executive, you will be responsible for developing and implementing SEO strategies to improve website traffic. You will be required to analyze the website’s performance and find out ways to improve them efficiently.

**Roles and Responsiblities:**

* To have technical knowledge across SEO including the ability to execute all aspects of technical, on-site, and off-site SEO
* Create on-page recommendations to improve SEO performance and rankings
* Compile detailed performance reports covering key metrics including organic traffic, keyword rankings, and conversions
* Perform keyword research in coordination with business objectives to optimise existing content and uncover new opportunities
* Perform off-page activities as well as on-page optimization techniques for boosting keyword rankings
* Have expertise in guest blogging (paid and unpaid)
* Generate leads through SEO
* Communicate effectively on progress to senior leadership

**Requirements:**

* Experience in Google Analytics, GTM, Search Console, Google Data Studio, Moz tool, Screaming Frog, SEMrush, Ubersuggest, and Google Site Speed Checker
* Good understanding of acquisition marketing and how SEO fits into this

**Our Way Of Working**  

* An opportunity to work on something that really matters.
* A fast-paced environment to learn and grow. High transparency in decision making.
* High autonomy; freedom to take risks, to experiment, and to fail.
* Market competitive salary.
  

We promise a meaningful journey with smart people, with opportunities to learn & grow.  

Plus, you can sleep peacefully knowing you are impacting lives in a big way, every day!

title: SEO Specialist
description:
The **SEO Specialist** plays a pivotal role in propelling VersaChalk's online visibility to unprecedented heights. Their expertise will guide our organic search strategies, ensuring our brand resonates effectively within the digital ecosystem, capturing the attention and admiration of our target audience.

**Join us by applying directly at https://www.southstreetdesigns.com/jobs**

**Key responsibilities:**  
- Conduct extensive keyword research to guide content teams.  
- Set SEO Roadmap and campaigns.  
- Optimize website elements for improved SEO, including meta tags, content, and site structure.  
- Collaborate with content and design teams to produce SEO-friendly content.  
- Perform regular site audits to ensure best SEO practices are upheld.  
- Identify SEO gaps and strategies for keyword-optimized platforms and work with marketing members responsible in the Social Media Marketing Area.  
- Develop off-page SEO strategies to build brand authority and backlinks.

**Software/Tools:**  
- Google Analytics & Search Console  
- SEMrush or Ahrefs  
- Screaming Frog or similar site audit tools

**Skill set:**  
- Deep understanding of Google’s algorithm and SEO best practices.  
- Strong analytical skills and ability to interpret data.  
- Proficient in SEO tools and software.  
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

**Experience:**  
- Minimum 3 years of hands-on SEO experience.  
- Proven track record of improving SEO metrics for an e-commerce brand.  
- Familiarity with content management systems.

**Do not apply if:**  
- You aren't comfortable with using multiple SEO tools or learning new ones.  
- You're looking for a short-term position.  
- You're not ready to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.

**Scenario Questions:**  
- How would you approach improving organic traffic for new products in a competitive niche?  
- How would you conduct keyword research to guide content teams in optimizing the website's SEO?  
- Can you provide an example of an SEO campaign you have managed, including the strategy you employed and the results you achieved?

**Our core values:**  
At South Street Designs, we believe in creating an environment where everyone can be their authentic selves and contribute their unique perspective to the team. We strive to ensure our company culture is grounded in positive values like trust and respect, collaboration, resilience, and innovation. title: SEO Specialist
description:
Overview:  
As an SEO Specialist, you will play a critical role in enhancing our organization's online visibility and driving organic traffic to our digital platforms. You will be responsible for developing and implementing strategies to optimize our website's search engine rankings and improve overall online presence. Your expertise in SEO techniques and analysis will contribute to increasing brand awareness, generating leads, and ultimately, maximizing our digital marketing efforts' effectiveness.

NOTE: We have 2 website spujah.com and life-balance.ae. It would be a project basis role

Key Responsibilities

Keyword Research and Analysis:

* Conduct comprehensive keyword research to identify relevant search terms and phrases.
* Analyze keyword competitiveness and search volume to determine the most valuable targets.
* Develop keyword strategies for content optimization and website ranking improvement.

On-Page SEO Optimization:

* Optimize website content, including landing pages, blog posts, and product pages, for targeted keywords.
* Implement on-page SEO elements such as meta tags, headers, and structured data markup.
* Ensure website structure and navigation are search engine-friendly for improved crawlability and indexing.

Technical SEO:

* Audit website for technical issues affecting SEO performance, such as site speed, mobile-friendliness, and crawl errors.
* Collaborate with web development and IT teams to implement technical SEO recommendations.
* Monitor website health and performance metrics using tools like Google Search Console and third-party SEO software.
* Create pillar pages.

Off-Page SEO and Link Building:

* Develop and execute off-page SEO strategies to build high-quality backlinks from authoritative websites.
* Identify opportunities for guest blogging, influencer partnerships, and other link-building tactics.
* Monitor backlink profile and disavow toxic or spammy links to maintain a healthy link profile.

Content Strategy and Optimization:

* Collaborate with content creators to produce SEO-friendly content aligned with target keywords and audience intent.
* Optimize content for search engines while maintaining readability and user experience.
* Track content performance metrics and adjust strategies based on data insights.

SEO Performance Tracking and Reporting:

* Monitor key SEO metrics such as organic traffic, keyword rankings, and conversion rates.
* Generate regular reports to track progress and communicate insights to stakeholders.
* Use analytics tools like Google Analytics and SEO platforms to measure campaign effectiveness and ROI.

Stay Updated on SEO Trends and Best Practices:

* Keep abreast of industry trends, algorithm updates, and best practices in SEO.
* Continuously evaluate and refine SEO strategies to adapt to changing search engine algorithms and user behaviors.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: ₹20,000.00 per month

Experience:

* SEO: 1 year (Required)

Application Deadline: 31/03/2024

title: SEO Specialist
description:
As a Senior SEO Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in optimizing our digital presence and driving organic traffic to our website. You will be responsible for developing and implementing advanced SEO strategies, analyzing data, and staying abreast of industry trends to maximize our online visibility and improve search engine rankings.

Key Responsibilities:

* Develop and execute comprehensive SEO strategies to increase organic traffic, improve keyword rankings, and enhance the overall online visibility of our brand.
* Conduct thorough keyword research and analysis to identify high-value keywords and optimize website content accordingly.
* Collaborate with content creators, developers, and designers to ensure SEO best practices are integrated into website architecture, content creation, and design elements.
* Perform on-page and off-page optimization techniques, including link building, content optimization, and technical SEO audits, to improve website performance.
* Monitor and analyze website traffic, user behavior, and search engine algorithms using tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and SEO software platforms.
* Generate regular performance reports and actionable insights to stakeholders, highlighting key metrics, trends, and opportunities for optimization.
* Stay updated on industry trends, algorithm updates, and best practices in SEO and digital marketing to continuously refine strategies and tactics.
* Provide guidance and mentorship to junior members of the SEO team, fostering a culture of learning and innovation.
* Collaborate cross-functionally with marketing, content, and product teams to align SEO initiatives with broader business goals and objectives.
* Keep abreast of emerging technologies and trends in search engine optimization, recommending innovative approaches to enhance our SEO efforts.

Qualifications:

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, Computer Science, or related field.
* Proven track record of success in implementing SEO strategies and driving organic traffic growth for websites.
* In-depth knowledge of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and SEO best practices.
* Proficiency in SEO tools and platforms such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Moz, Ahrefs, etc.
* Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, draw insights, and make data-driven decisions.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across teams and stakeholders.
* Demonstrated leadership experience and the ability to mentor and coach junior team members.
* Detail-oriented mindset with a focus on delivering high-quality results in a fast-paced environment.
* Continuous learning mindset with a passion for staying updated on industry trends and emerging technologies in SEO and digital marketing.

**job Overview:** As the SEO Manager/SEO Team Lead, you will be responsible for leading our SEO efforts, optimizing our online presence, and ensuring our clients achieve maximum visibility in search engines. You will play a crucial role in managing a team of SEO specialists, providing strategic direction, and delivering exceptional results for our clients.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Team Leadership:** Lead and mentor a team of SEO specialists, providing guidance and support to ensure their professional growth and development.

**Client Management:** Collaborate with clients to understand their business goals, develop SEO strategies tailored to their needs, and maintain strong client relationships.

**SEO Strategy:** Develop and execute comprehensive SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings, drive traffic, and increase conversion rates.

**Keyword Research:** Conduct in-depth keyword research to identify opportunities for content optimization and expansion.

**On-Page and Off-Page Optimization:** Implement on-page and off-page SEO best practices to enhance website performance and backlink profile.

**Content Strategy:** Collaborate with content teams to create SEO-friendly content and ensure content aligns with SEO strategies.

**Monitoring and Trends:** Stay up-to-date with industry trends, search engine algorithm updates, and emerging SEO tools to maintain a competitive edge.

**Budget Management:** Manage SEO budgets for client campaigns effectively, ensuring optimal resource allocation.

**Performance Metrics:** Track and report on key performance indicators (KPIs), such as organic traffic, keyword rankings, and conversion rates.

title: SEO Specialist
description:
Responsible for analyzing, reviewing, and implementing changes to websites to optimize them for search engines. This means maximizing the traffic to a site by improving page rank within search engines. A comprehensive job description for an SEO Specialist typically includes the following duties and skills:

Key Responsibilities:

* **Website Analysis:** Conduct thorough site analysis and audits to identify current issues and opportunities for SEO improvements.
* **Keyword Research:** Perform detailed keyword research to identify and target high-value search terms relevant to the business.
* **On-Page Optimization:** Implement on-page SEO strategies including optimizing title tags, meta descriptions, headers, and content for targeted keywords.
* **Content Strategy:** Work closely with content creators to advise on content creation that is optimized for SEO, including the use of keywords, content structure, and relevancy.
* **Technical SEO:** Address technical SEO issues that could be hindering site performance, such as site speed optimization, mobile optimization, and fixing broken links.
* **Link Building:** Develop and implement effective link-building strategies to enhance domain authority and rankings.
* **SEO Reporting:** Monitor and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) such as traffic, rankings, and visibility. Use tools like Google Analytics and SEMrush to track progress and adjust strategies accordingly.
* **Competitor Analysis:** Analyze competitors’ websites and SEO strategies to identify opportunities for improvement and differentiation.
* **Collaboration:** Work with web developers and marketing teams to ensure SEO best practices are being followed in website development and marketing strategies.
* **Stay Updated:** Keep up to date with the latest SEO trends, search algorithm updates, and industry best practices.

Skills and Qualifications:

* **Proven SEO Experience:** Demonstrable experience in improving website rankings and online visibility.
* **Analytical Skills:** Ability to use analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Webmaster Tools) to gauge the success of SEO efforts and make data-driven decisions.
* **Technical Skills:** Understanding of technical aspects of SEO, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as they relate to SEO.
* **Content Knowledge:** Knowledge of how to create SEO-friendly content for various types of websites.
* **Problem-Solving:** Ability to identify issues and implement effective solutions quickly.
* **Communication Skills:** Strong communication skills to collaborate with team members and report findings and strategies effectively.
* **Adaptability:** Ability to adapt to new SEO trends and algorithm changes.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Salary: ₹250,000.00 - ₹500,000.00 per month

* Morning shift

* Commission pay
* Performance bonus

description:
**Company Description:**

Mehu Solutions Private Limited is a non-governmental transportation Services Company located in Noida, India. We provide travel planning, booking and management services to our customers. As a registered company in Delhi, we are committed to providing world-class travel solutions.

**Job Title: SEO Specialist/SEO Executive** 

***Job Overview:*** 

We are seeking a talented and experienced SEO professional to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for implementing SEO strategies and tactics to drive organic traffic, improve website visibility, and enhance overall online presence.

***Role Description:*** This is a full-time on-site role for a Search Engine Optimization Specialist located in Noida. The Search Engine Optimization Specialist will be responsible for performing keyword research, SEO audits, link building, web analytics, and on-page SEO tasks. The specialist will also be responsible for developing and implementing effective strategies that improve search engine rankings, drive traffic, and increase revenue.

***Key Responsibilities:***

**1. Keyword Research:** 

* Conduct thorough keyword research to identify opportunities for organic traffic growth.
* Analyse and select relevant keywords for content optimization.

**2. On-Page Optimization:**

* Optimize website content, Meta tags, and other on-page elements for search engines.
* Ensure proper use of header tags, alt attributes, and internal linking.

**3. Technical SEO:** 

* Conduct technical SEO audits to identify and resolve issues that may impact website performance in search engines.
* Collaborate with the development team to implement technical SEO recommendations.

**4. Content Strategy:** 

* Develop and execute content strategies that align with SEO goals.
* Create and optimize content for both users and search engines.

**5. Link Building:** 

* Plan and execute effective link-building strategies to increase the website's authority.
* Identify opportunities for quality backlinks and partnerships.

**6. Monitoring and Reporting:** 

* Monitor and analyze website performance using SEO tools.
* Prepare and present regular reports on key SEO metrics and performance.

**7. Stay Updated on SEO Trends:** 

* Stay informed about industry trends, search engine algorithm updates, and best practices.
* Implement changes to strategies based on the evolving SEO landscape.

**8. Collaboration:**

* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including content creators, developers and marketing teams.
* Provide SEO guidance and support for website initiatives.

***Qualifications:*** 

* Proven experience in implementing successful SEO strategies.
* In-depth knowledge of search engine algorithms and ranking factors.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in SEO.

***Qualifications:*** 

* Strong knowledge of Keyword Research and On-Page SEO
* Experience in SEO Audits and link-building

* Attention to detail and ability to make data-driven decisions

title: SEO Executive
description:
**Job Overview**

  


We are looking for a tech-savvy individual who is interested in working as an SEO Executive for our company.


As an SEO Executive, you will be responsible for developing and implementing SEO strategies to improve website traffic. You will also be responsible for researching keywords and staying on top of the Search Engine Results page.


To be successful in this job position, you should analyze the website’s performance and find out ways to improve them efficiently. You will also be coordinating with the content team to write content that is attractive and engaging.


Apart from this, you should possess strong explaining skills and the ability to stay updated with Google algorithm changes. You should have excellent communication skills and extraordinary analysis skills.


If you think you can take up this challenging job role of an SEO executive, then write to us now. We look forward to working with you.


#### **Responsibilities**

* Implementing and developing SEO strategies.
* Researching the competitors, both on-site and off-site.
* Performing keyword research for content.
* Writing engaging SEO content along with the Content.
* Optimizing content regularly on the website.
* Maintaining the website on a regular basis.
* Developing and implementing link building strategies.
* Collaborating with the Digital Marketing team.
* Analyzing the website using the analytical tool.
* Improving website performance.
* Proposing changes in the website content.
* Measuring the ROI and success of the website.
* Staying up to date with the latest Google Algorithm changes.
* Create effective and unique content for multiple off-page submission activities.
* Must have experience in Seo on page and Seo off page
* Good in researching submission websites for various SEO activities.
* Highly creative and experienced in identifying target audiences to generate leads for the business.
* Good knowledge of Google tools including Google Search Console, Google Tag Manager, and Google Analytics.
* Strong knowledge of technical on page SEO including site audit, Meta tags, content optimization, robot and sitemap files, etc.

title: SEO Manager
description:
**Job Summary:**

We are looking for a strategic and hands-on Senior SEO Manager who will play a key role in developing and executing comprehensive SEO strategies to drive organic growth for our clients, while handling junior SEO executives and their day-to-day activities. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of successful SEO campaigns, strong leadership skills, and a deep understanding of the evolving landscape of search engine algorithms.

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop and implement effective SEO strategies that align with clients' business goals and objectives.
* Lead and mentor a team of SEO specialists, providing guidance, training, and performance feedback.
* Conduct thorough keyword research, competitive analysis, and technical audits to identify opportunities for optimization.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including content creators, developers, and designers, to ensure SEO best practices are integrated into all aspects of digital marketing campaigns.
* Stay informed about industry trends, algorithm updates, and emerging technologies to proactively adjust strategies and tactics.
* Analyse and report on the performance of SEO campaigns, providing actionable insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.
* Monitor and optimize on-page and off-page factors to enhance search engine rankings and organic visibility.
* Keep abreast of industry best practices and contribute to the development of internal SEO processes and standards.

* SEO Executive: 2 years (Preferred)
